story:
AIRbox: More Powerful than

HEPA Purifiers

 

Over 1600 family sponsors

AIRbox recently reached the funding target on the crowdfunding platform in Japan within merely 5 hours, and also successfully created millions of sales figures on the crowdfunding platform in Taiwan.

 

AIRbox is designed for small spaces and cars.

With only 4.3 oz, not just is it space-saving, but it can also attach to any surface. As long as you find out where the odor originates and place AIRbox at the source, the smell will be slowly eliminated. In addition, AIRbox can also relief allergies and insomnia resulting from the long exposure of air pollutants. We expect that AIRbox will become your best tool when it comes to bettering and enhancing the air quality around you.

 

NASA’s Technology｜Beyond existing technology

This is the air purifier that will change your view of air purifiers forever. Equipped with the most advanced photocatalysis nanotechnology and negative ion generator, AIRbox is designed to clean the air around you. 

 

BREATHE CLEAN AIR ANYTIME, ANYWHERE!

Whether you want to go on a trip, relax on the couch at home, drive a car, work in the office, or go to bed, the air quality surrounding you is critical. With its portable design and easy USB charging, AIRbox can keep the air around you clean. 

On weekdays, if you spend most of your time in an enclosed office space, the air around you is important. Not only can healthy air keep you energized, but it can also improve your mood while working.

With its exclusive patented photocatalytic technology, AIRbox can decompose harmful gases resulted from high temperature in your car. It can also decompose volatile organic gases commonly found in car, such as formaldehyde. 

Eliminate mold pores and common household odors in bathrooms, shoes cabinets, and other areas of the house. Clean dust mites and bacteria in the bedrooms to protect your loved ones. 

 

Testing and Certifications

In order to test the effectiveness of AIRbox, an experiment was done to prove that it could remove mold spores in the air. We prepared two separate plastic containers and put one slice of toast in each, but had AIRbox running in only one of them. After a few days, the slice of bread with no AIRbox had significantly more mold growth.

 

SGS Certification

AIRbox is proven to make a great achievement in VOCs removal. The below graph shows that AIRbox was able to remove 99% of formaldehyde in SGS Certification Test.

AIRbox demonstrates the ability to reduce bacteria counts in the air. SGS verified that it has 99% elimination rate on staphylococcus aureus bacteria.

 

How AIRbox works

 

Powerful nanotechnology in photocatalysis

Airbox can break down VOC (like ammonia and formaldehyde) and airborne microbes (like mold and bacteria) within the interior “photocatalytic nanotechnology”chamber, and “negative ion technology” further purifies the surrounding air.

 

Airbox is notably different from traditional air purifiers

Traditional air purifiers clean the air by filtering dust particles and harmful elements.  However, many toxic particles are too small to be captured by filters. Airbox not only traps dirty particles, but also decompose harmful organic compounds into carbon dioxide and water by using “photocatalytic nanotechnology”, instead of being just a particle-collecting filter.

 

In comparison with traditional HEPA air purifiers, it can break down toxic chemicals, clean up finer dust particles, and destroy more viruses and bacteria.  Its powerful efficiency of cleansing and sterilizing can better the effect of the air purification.

 

 

AIRbox Main Features

 

Case Study 1 : Air Quality and Health

Asthma and runny nose are not the sole symptom of the bad air quality, but these symptoms are the warning signs that your health has been negatively impacted! Even though you haven’t come across any major health problems so far, it doesn’t mean that you are staying healthy. AIRbox can be your best tool that will help you relief some common health issues.

 

Do you know indoor air quality is pivotal to our health?

If you experience any of the following symptoms on a regular basis, you should consider examining your environment for any allergens or toxic elements. When these allergens first develop in the environment, your symptoms usually don't appear immediately. You will start experiencing discomfort when they have accumulated in your body for a long time. Act fast now to prevent them from turning into chronic illness. 

The mold spores in the bathroom. The dust mites in the bedroom. The toxic air trapped inside the car. Allergens and pollutants are everywhere. Indoor spaces often contain more allergens than outdoors. Since we spend most of our day indoor, the indoor air quality becomes critical to our overall health.

 

Solution

Face masks and alcohol-based sanitizers become everyday essentials and necessary precautions to protect the health of our family. What's more, allergens and pollutants can also have major damaging effect on our bodies. Air purifiers were invented for a reason: air isn't something that can be cleaned by wipes, and sometimes you can't control the air quality around you. 

 

The size is smaller than a palm

 

Quiet

 

No Consumables

AIRbox adopts a patented washable filter so you will not have any extra spending on “the filter.”

 

Case Study 2 : Pollutants in Cars

Based on research evidence, the pollutants in cars are at a high level because cars draw in exhaust fumes emitted from other vehicles and circulate them. As a result, the pollutants in-car are mostly from the adjacent vehicles, especially the severely polluted ones such as diesel trucks. Because cars are not airtight, pollutants can get into the car through air vents or other small openings. 

 

Most filters installed in the cars cannot remove toxic matters

 

Most car filters can only capture large dusts, but there are plenty of toxic chemicals and germs in the cars which are constantly being inhaled. For the elderlies, children, and those with compromised immune systems, inhaling these toxic chemicals could increase the chance of developing chronic illness. For long distance driving, the polluted air may make drivers drowsy and hard to concentrate, and passengers are more likely to experience motion sickness. 

 

You can use AIRbox to bring you and your passengers clean air.

 

 

Instruction Guide

 

Features Guide

 

Specifications

 

Early Bird Specials:

 

The Birth of AIRbox

AIRbox is an air purifier with a patented“photocatalytic reactor” and “negative ion generator.” Not only can it reduce germs and allergens, but it can also get rid of odors and toxic chemicals (such as formaldehyde). It has a sleek design, and its effective and user-friendly. In comparison with traditional large air purifiers, AIRbox boosts its portable size which can bring clean air to you anywhere and anytime.

Constant Innovation is proud to partner with YFLife to bring AIRbox to the mass market. The traditional HEPA purifiers on the market cannot destroy airborne harmful chemicals, which will cause respiratory and lung diseases once they are inhaled and accumulated in human bodies. Therefore, we wanted to find the solution to this health problem. After receiving numerous feedbacks from both teams and our end users, we are pleased to introduce AIRbox to you and we hope it become a necessity in your life. 

Product

Stretch Goal

Initially we will offer two color choices: Matte Black and Metallic Silver. But we know two colors are just boring! We want to be able to provide more color selections to you! However, we need your support to make it happen. If the campaign exceeds $400,000, we will add the following color selections: Peacock Blue, Golden Orange, and Champagne Gold!  

Risks and challenges

Ideas never get realized? Issues finding a factory for production? These things would never happen with our project, because we've put in the effort to put our ideas into reality and we already have the first batch of products in hands. We have established a long-term working relationship with the factory for many years, and for many of our existing products. However, we do aware of possible risks that can still impact the most well-planned project, which includes: Supply Chain Risk - Sometimes a machine or tool could break, factory loses power due to weather condition, or suppliers deliver wrong materials. These things happen from time to time and can affect how long it takes to build our products. Maybe we will get a million orders and our factory may not produce all the goods on time. Sounds like a good problem to have and we hope we get there, and we will do our best to keep our promises on the delivery time frame. Shipping Risk - Shipping could be delayed due to holidays or other issues occurred during transit. We promise to give you full transparency whenever a problem occurs. We will keep you up to date with our latest news and deadlines.

story:
MEET THE TERRA-GLIDE 

Over 100+ exercises to do at home. Balance Trainer, Ab-Roller, & More. 

 

 

 


 

 

 

ADD-ONS AVAILABLE WITH PURCHASE 
 

Hanging Hook 


Knee Pad 


12 Pound Power Band 


30 Pound Power Band 


60 Pound Power Band 

The Design Process. 

We have been working on the Terra Glide for almost three years. Three years? Yes. We are either really dumb or highly persistent. We're going with persistent. After we saw our initial prototypes showed so much promise, it drove us to keep improving. All of the hard work has paid off. We are extremely confident that the Terra-Glide is absolutely going to change the way people work out.   

We have engineered each component to insure it will last a lifetime while delivering the results you are looking for.

We wouldn't settle for anything less than the best. Our manufacturing partner has decades of experience building the highest quality equipment in the fitness market. They have rigorously tested every part for durability and perfect tolerances. We have done mock assembly runs deliberately and have broken dozens upon dozens of prototypes to test their limits. Each time, with each break, came new improvements. As a team, we are anxious to move forward to the next step. Production. After all, it has been three years!

We have always known that balance and agility were the proverbial fountains of youth. We also know that if you feel young, you want to be in the game. What game? The game of life, of course. Being active, playing the sports you love, overall wellness, looking and feeling great.

It became our "why". Our purpose. Design a device that allowed for endless progression. The kind of progression where you start at your own pace and never run out of road. Progression that provides everything you need to stay strong, healthy and active. Progression that provides the type of fun that used to get you grounded.

With full clarity of purpose, we began choosing the movements that would make this possible and started designing from the ground up. Sure, there are plenty of balance devices; why wouldn't there be? Balance is crucial. We had no trouble finding ab devices. The market is flooded with core trainers and things that move.  What we couldn't find was a place big enough to store all these things (oh wait, that is called a gym). We were also plagued with the fact that if you did indeed have room for all these different pieces of equipment, you would be working all the time just to pay for them! We knew there was a better solution. We designed it and here we are.

Of course, there was FAR more to the process than we have noted. All you need to know is that it worked brilliantly!

story:
I'm a long term traveller, a big time dreamer, fairytale believer, magic maker, medicine woman…the list is infinite ;)

The last few years has taken me to Europe, India, Africa, North America, Central America and finally my last destination. I'm trying to find a way to reconcile this inner longing to live a spiritual life with sustaining myself with the basic necessities…i.e. food, shelter, community. It's proving possible so far by living day to day on very little means offering my time and energy in communities in return for board and stay.

I've been practicing yoga since 2012 and its become an intrinsic part of my daily life. This connection that it provides is the only thing that seems to make sense. It has saved me from depression and given me perspective on purpose. I have long been studying and practicing but now feel it is time to take it to the next step - get certified as a yoga teacher so that I can share with others what I love along the way.

How can you help me? By helping me complete my yoga teacher training, you will be helping me complete my longer term vision that a friend and I are working on now. We are traveling to accumulate all the knowledge we need but sometimes you need certifications to proof that you have what's already there. You will help me share this passion with others and hopefully inspire them for connection to their divine inner selves. 

If you can help even a little bit, I will be eternally grateful. So much love. Keep dancing along the spiral!

Love,

Sinead

story:
Where we began.

In 2011, while sitting at the Claim Jumper Restaurant in Carlsbad, CA with my girlfriend Shelly, I came up with the idea for Metamorphosis Travel.

We wanted to launch a business accompanying depressed and stressed individuals on trips around the world. We believe that if someone who is stressed out on life, they will gain perspective on a trip somewhere out of their familiar environment. A mental vacation where they wouldn't have to be anywhere at any time. One that we would make adventurous, and from time to time even a little dangerous. One where they can truly leave behind the world that they are accustomed to with it’s high tech connectivity, depressing debt and domestic problems.

What would we do?

We are both credentialed healthcare professionals, with a psych background. . Metamorphosis Travel can help people fully understand that there is more to life than the way they are accustomed. We can educate them with the precious knowledge that there are people all over the world that are happy, doing much less with minimal resources. We teach people there is a world view out there and a larger perspective. A WORLD PERSPECTIVE. Get back to basics, and live life on a daily level.

People for 1000's of years, up until the early 1900s, were dependent on daily living and the need to provide for themselves and their family. Everyone had a place in society, and everyone worked every day to make it to the next. They didn't plan much more than 24 hours ahead of time. This basic life strategy has been lost in our current world. So much so that we become self-absorbed and purposeless. We are now just individuals that march along to the beat of our own drums and own survival with little regard for others let alone our intuition.

How do we do it?

We feel that it is through daily living and planning we achieve a sense of purpose in a day-to-day life. We feel that we can learn by travel. If we can live every day, one day at a time... we develop a sense of self purpose. There were many times while traveling the world when we followed our intuition, be it Shelly’s or mine. We acted on it and we followed it daily. We experienced more and did far more than we would have ever hoped to do by planning the trip. Life just took us along.

This can be a reality for people who are having issues with life. Now days we are too concerned about the future, and worrying about it incessantly and un-necessarily. We need to live our life day-to-day and live every day as if we only have another day to live. What would you be doing if you knew you had one more day to live?

We would like to teach people the realizations we've developed while traveling the world. I would like others to have the opportunity to go on a month to six-week mental health vacation. Whether it’s Central America, South America or Southeast Asia, the metamorphosis from caterpillar to butterfly might transform your life as it did ours.

 Why the campaign?

We would use the money to advertise in large psychology and travel magazines, both online and in print.  This is astronomically expensive and for two nurses with a travel addiction, we simply don't have the money to get this off the ground except with our website and social media.  Yes we need help, but more so we want to help others.  This mission is to transform lives as we do on a daily basis at work through travel experiences.  This is a dream we are embarking on.  We don't know if it work or not. However if there are enough people who believe in this, we will make an incredible impact on people's lives.

story:
Short Summary

For several years, Mrs. Gloria Griffith and Ms. Phyllis Thomas, sisters and true examples of endless giving, have been running a program called Literacy for All Ages. It is held weekly at Renaissance Presbyterian Church in the Westside community and regularly hosts 18-25 people. This program provides an opportunity for intergenerational learning, builds reading skills, and creates a forum to practice public speaking. The sisters also provide and prepare a meal for all participants. All of this is open to the public and is completely free. This year, they have decided to expand the program into a full summer camp.

A recent NY Times article found that 27 percent of the Chattanooga's residents and 42 percent of children live below the poverty line, nearly double the national and statewide average, respectively. Finding affordable, safe childcare throughout the summer can be extraordinarily difficult. Additionally, the Westside is situated within a food desert which means that the access to healthy and affordable food for children throughout the year, but particularly throughout the the summer is limited.

In an effort to help meet both of these needs, the summer camp will be held each weekday from June 2 until July 25 and will provide two healthy meals and a snack, all free of charge. Throughout the year, the children participating in the literacy program have helped to plant and tend to a community garden and will continue to do so throughout the summer. In addition, there will be a continuation of literacy development, cultural heritage and civic engagement programs, arts, crafts, and music. Mrs. Gloria and Ms. Phyllis also plan to incorporate a mentorship program between teenagers and children which will provide community teens with an avenue to grow in their understanding of the value of volunteerism and community.

What We Need & What The Children Get

People from throughout the country come to Chattanooga which has been heralded at one of the great tourist destinations of the United States. But for many of the Westside community children – children who live within sight of the mountain which houses tourist attractions such as Rock City and Ruby Falls, and who are within five minutes of the Tennessee Aquarium - access to local attractions is restricted. Mrs. Griffith and Ms. Phyllis would really love to facilitate the opportunity for them to go to places such as the Creative Discovery Museum, the Bessie Smith Hall, the Nature Center, and Lake Winnie. In addition, a Chattanooga neighborhood center is offering swimming lessons this summer and the children have been signed up for once weekly lessons for five weeks.

Unfortunately, these experiences aren't free. In order to take the approximately 30 children who will be attending summer camp, we will need to raise AT LEAST $1000. This does not include the cost of transportation! Every $10, $20, and $50 donation helps one or several of these amazing children have an experience which so many people take for granted.

If you give $10, you have helped two six year old girls go to the Creative Discovery Museum and dig for dinosaur bones, create music, and learn about electricity. Maybe they'll grow up to be an archeologist, a singer, or an engineer based off of what they're able to do this summer.

If you give $20, you have given an eight year old boy the opportunity to go to Lake Winnie at the end of the summer. He will have six hours of complete fun and will create life-long memories with his friends.

If you give $50, you have paid admission for nearly half of the camp to go to the Bessie Smith Hall and to learn about the Empress of the Blues who was born in their very own community!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Volunteer: This camp will be completely operated by volunteers. We anticipate approximately 30 children and we want each child to feel special! This is a wonderful opportunity to develop a mentorship with a child, or with several children, that may last a lifetime.

You have kids yourself and think you can't volunteer? Bring your children! What better way to instill the values of kindness, generosity, community, and volunteerism in your children than to let them spend a few hours of their summer months around people like Mrs. Gloria and Ms. Phyllis who have spent their lifetimes in service of their community and are quite literally angels walking on earth?

Transportation: If you have access to a van or a bus, or know someone who has access to a van or a bus, the additional funds necessary to take the children to and from their field trips will be greatly reduced.

Share the Word: Everyone can do this! Share it on Facebook, pass it through email, tell your church and work friends about it!
story_txt:
Short SummaryFor several years, Mrs. Gloria Griffith and Ms. Phyllis Thomas, sisters and true examples of endless giving, have been running a program called Literacy for All Ages. It is held weekly at Renaissance Presbyterian Church in the Westside community and regularly hosts 18-25 people. This program provides an opportunity for
intergenerational learning, builds reading skills, and creates a forum to
practice public speaking. The sisters also provide and prepare a meal for all participants. All of this is open
to the public and is completely free. This year, they have decided to expand the program into a full summer camp.A recent NY Times article found that 27
percent of the Chattanooga's residents and 42 percent of children live below the
poverty line, nearly double the national and statewide average, respectively.
Finding affordable, safe childcare throughout the summer can be extraordinarily
difficult.
Additionally, the Westside is situated within a food desert which means that
the access to healthy and affordable food for children throughout the year, but particularly throughout the the summer is
limited. In an effort to help meet both of these needs, the summer
camp will be held each weekday from June 2 until July 25 and will provide two healthy
meals and a snack, all free of charge. Throughout the year, the children
participating in the literacy program have helped to plant and tend to a
community garden and will continue to do so throughout the summer. In addition,
there will be a continuation of literacy development, cultural heritage and
civic engagement programs, arts, crafts, and music. Mrs. Gloria and Ms. Phyllis also plan to
incorporate a mentorship program between teenagers and children which will provide community teens with an avenue to grow in their understanding of the value
of volunteerism and community. 

What We Need & What The Children Get
People from throughout the country come to Chattanooga which has been heralded at one of the great tourist destinations of the United States. But for many of the Westside community children – children who
live within sight of the mountain which houses tourist attractions such as Rock
City and Ruby Falls, and who are within five minutes of the Tennessee Aquarium
- access to local attractions is restricted. Mrs. Griffith and Ms. Phyllis
would really love to facilitate the opportunity for them to go to places such
as the Creative Discovery Museum, the Bessie Smith Hall, the Nature Center, and
Lake Winnie. In addition, a Chattanooga neighborhood center is
offering swimming lessons this summer and the children have been signed up for
once weekly lessons for five weeks. Unfortunately, these experiences aren't free. In order to take the approximately 30 children who will be attending summer camp, we will need to raise AT LEAST $1000. This does not include the cost of transportation! Every $10, $20, and $50 donation helps one or several of these amazing children have an experience which so many people take for granted.If you give $10, you have helped two six year old girls go to the Creative Discovery Museum and dig for dinosaur bones, create music, and learn about electricity. Maybe they'll grow up to be an archeologist, a singer, or an engineer based off of what they're able to do this summer.If you give $20, you have given an eight year old boy the opportunity to go to Lake Winnie at the end of the summer. He will have six hours of complete fun and will create life-long memories with his friends.If you give $50, you have paid admission for nearly half of the camp to go to the Bessie Smith Hall and to learn about the Empress of the Blues who was born in their very own community!Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Volunteer: This camp will be completely operated by volunteers. We anticipate approximately 30 children and we want each child to feel special! This is a wonderful opportunity to develop a mentorship with a child, or with several children, that may last a lifetime. You have kids yourself and think you can't volunteer? Bring your children! What better way to instill the values of kindness, generosity, community, and volunteerism in your children than to let them spend a few hours of their summer months around people like Mrs. Gloria and Ms. Phyllis who have spent their lifetimes in service of their community and are quite literally angels walking on earth?Transportation: If you have access to a van or a bus, or know someone who has access to a van or a bus, the additional funds necessary to take the children to and from their field trips will be greatly reduced.Share the Word: Everyone can do this! Share it on Facebook, pass it through email, tell your church and work friends about it!

story:
Thank you!!

$11,685 raised online. $5,500 raised off line. Total of $17,185!!!

So much good is being done. :)

UPDATE 10/16/14

This is it! Today is the final day. We have received 125 donations so far & I am so grateful! If you haven't donated yet, please do! So many lives are depending on us. Be kind. :) 

UPDATE 10/10/14

Thrilled that the cool Chris Gorham perk was donated for yesterday! I've been shifting new perks and replacing the old ones as much as I can to keep up! They allow me to list 20 at a time. :) Thank you to Maria Menounos for tweeting about the campaign! Time is running short! We can do this!

UPDATE 10/9/14

WOOHOO! We are at $10,035 online with 1 week to go! We have received tremendous support on Twitter with over 1,800 tweets from Alyssa Milano, Michael Chiklis, Juliette Lewis and YOU! Let's keep the momentum going and reach that goal!

UPDATE 10/6/14

I'm so enthused! We have hit $9,290 online! Thank you to Three time Daytime Emmy Award winner Sarah Brown for donating! Thanks to Lacey Chabert for donating a cool perk! The perks are flying! I'm constantly shifting them in and out as they are contributed for. Two books from Brian Michael Bendis had been donated for, a Ralph Macchio card & autographed DVD have been grabbed. Keep it going! Can we reach our goal in time? Just 10 days left! 

UPDATE 9/27/14

We have hit $8,300 thanks to donations by Mark Ruffalo and Jason O'Mara! So pleased and excited! So many lives are going to be improved! 

UPDATE 9/26/14

Thrilled that we have hit the $7,700 mark due to a Ralph Macchio perk and James Morrison's third perk being donated for! (I have a limit of 20 perks that I'm allowed to showcase at once. I have to delete some ones that have been taken as we move along.) The $40,000 goal seems far away, but I still believe! I have such faith in my kind friends. You always come through! 

I'm touched that Ralph Macchio visited Carroll Center today! He witnessed the great work being done. Staff & students were excited!

UPDATE 9/24/14

So happy the the Mark Ruffalo perk went so fast! I feel re-energized! Together, we are doing something truly special for some great people!

UPDATE 9/23/14

Thanks to my pal Mark Ruffalo for donating a cool perk! I'm ready to have this fundraiser explode! Please give. :) 

UPDATE 9/22/14

Huge thanks to my amazing friend Christa Miller for her generous donation! Funniest woman on TV is also the kindest. :) 
We have 25 days left. Please donate what you can! I am so determined to reach the goal! 

UPDATE 9/18/14

Thanks to "American Ninja Warrior" Host Matt Isman for your donation! We are more than halfway through the fundraiser. So many great donations! Thanks! My goal is still a long way off & we are at 16%. Can you help me put the fundraiser into the next gear? Please be as generous as you can!

UPDATE 9/14/14

I'm so touched. Kristen Johnston, Jenny McCarthy and Chris Gorham all donated this weekend. All three have gone out of their way to donate themselves and tweet about the fundraiser extensively. My pal VerLyn and others continue to donate and support Carroll Center so much. I am pumped up! Let's keep it going! New perks are always being added. The latest from Paige Davis. Yay Paige! 

UPDATE 9/11/14

Huge thank you to Rita Wilson & Tom Hanks for sending in an online donation via check for this fundraiser! Rita has become such a dear friend. She is a true angel! The perks continue to go quickly! Kristen Johnston helped raise $1,000 for the campaign with her Twitter follows. Kristen ALWAYS has my back! Julie Benz has raised $700 thus far with 2 of her signed DVDs being donated for. I love Julie! Jeri Ryan, James Morrison and Charisma Carpenter also has perks donated for. I appreciate all my friends! More perks are still available & more are being added all the time. I am behind the pace to reach the goal in time, but I have faith in YOU! 

UPDATE 9/4/14

Thank you so much to those that have donated so far! The perks are being grabbed & it makes me so happy! Thank you to the hundreds upon hundreds of you that have tweeted & shard this campaign on Facebook. We are changing lives! Keep it going & donate what you can!

Original post:

It's time!!! I can't believe that it's time already for my 5th annual fundraiser for The Carroll Center for the Blind. I'm so excited!! You have really come through for me in years past. My first annual fundraiser raised $7,000, the second $10,000, third $20,000 and last year's fourth raised $26,400! I'm raising the bar even higher this year! I want to raise $40,000 for this amazing cause!

I've assembled a great group of perks with the help of my celebrity friends. It's a great reason to donate to a great cause! And please remember that the money goes to help the blind. You are getting a great item AND donating to a cause that truly changes so many lives for the better.

Geno with Julie Benz at Carroll Center August 2014

What will your donation help with? It will help the Carroll Center for the Blind continue it's special mission of helping the Blind for close to 80 years. From elementary school children to adults to seniors, CCB helps people of all ages who are blind or have limited vision. 
I have witnessed amazing transformations at the Carroll Center time and time again. When I meet with blind individuals on CCB Information Days, many are scared, angry and sad. They have lost their vision due to eye disease, car accidents, back or heart operations (which kept oxygen from their eyes for too long), gunshots, suicide attempts, domestic violence etc. Everyone has their own unique story. Fast forward several months later to their Carroll Center graduation and these individuals are happy, confident and ready to tackle life, work and play. Why? The Carroll Center is special.

Carroll Center students at Graduation

The Carroll Center has fantastic counselors who deal with the many emotional issues that a blind person faces. Their mobility instructors help a blind person be able to walk the streets, take public transportation etc. and be confident. The cooking classes allow a blind individual to cook with joy and confidence again. The Technology department is second to none and takes advantage of all the fantastic new advances to aid in the life of a blind person. The fencing classes and woodworking shop are unique experiences that many organizations have patterned their own training after.

I know I tweet a lot about the Carroll Center. It's my life. I fought hard to be here and alive right now. I feel I'm here for a purpose. This is it. Help me change some very special people's lives. Do a great thing. Please donate. Thank You! - Geno

story:
ANNOUNCEMENT: Your can now place your orders directly on our website at TheQuantlet.com!

Backer Shipments Are Now Complete!

 

"You've Just Found The Most Powerful Physical Performance Improvement & Wellness Enhancement Tool Anywhere"

Honored By Being Named To The 2016 Class of The

The Quantlet's core technology gives you ALL of these benefits:

  • Increase exercise efficiency and capacity at the touch of a button
  • Extend exercise times by more than 22% without strength reduction
  • Achieve a higher peak force in resistance training
  • Attain a sense of well-being you may have not thought possible…

 

Our Story

Over a year ago, a team of 5 physicians, scientists and engineers set out to create a new kind of wearable device. This device would leverage the power of two of nature’s fundamentals: light and thermal energy and their effect on the body.

This device would not simply measure your heart rate or other common fitness metrics like most other wearables do today. Rather, it would enable anyone to optimize their body’s function by simply using light and cold to ultimately revolutionize human performance.

In June of 2015, the Quantlet made its debut during the keynote speech at the Voice & Exit 2015 conference by Dr. Jack Kruse, one of the Quantlet's inventors. Dr. Kruse is a respected Neurosurgeon and author of the book Epi-paleo Rx: The Prescription for Disease Reversal and Optimal Health. 

 

 

There, Dr. Kruse shared his findings and explained just how he lost 133 pounds and packed on muscle in a matter of months. More importantly, he also discussed why he used light and cold to achieve his impressive results. 

 

 

Specifically, Dr. Kruse revealed how the Quantlet uses a technique called photobiomodulation to deliver multiple frequencies of light into the body to achieve remarkable physical results. That’s a big word, so let’s break it down into its component parts:  

PHOTO = Light. BIO = Life. MODULATION = Change. 

The effects of photobiomodulation were discovered over 40 years ago and have since been studied at such prestigious institutions as Harvard and NASA.

Photobiomodulation has a photochemical effect (much like photosynthesis in plants). One of the main mechanisms of action occurs inside mitochondria, the energy power plant inside every cell. 

Photobiomodulation's effects depend on the application of the appropriate wavelength and density of light, delivered to the target tissues for a specific period of time.

Most of the scientific evidence for photobiomodulation has focused on its impressive effects on tissue repair (skin wounds, muscle, tendon, bone, nerves), but also on how it reduces inflammation and eradicates pain wherever light of particular characteristics is applied. (PubMed refs)

According to peer-reviewed scientific literature, light acts at the cellular level by stimulating cells to generate more energy and utilize oxygen more effectively. 

Within certain blood-based cells exist mitochondria, which produce cellular energy in the form of a molecule called adenosine triphosphate or ATP for short. 

An enzyme in mitochondria known as cytochrome c-oxidase (CCO) utilizes light's photons to increase ATP and reduce oxidative stress. A cascade of mitochondrial and intracellular downstream effects then lead to astounding results including tissue repair and reduced inflammation. (Pubmed refs)

What Has Been Largely Missed Is That Photobiomodulation Can Also Enhance Athletic Performance

In multiple studies conducted across the globe in countries such as Germany, Russia, China, and Brazil, investigators have long noted that when using specific frequencies and intensities of light for the irradiation of blood, subjects in those studies have shown improvements in lipid levels, cholesterol, blood sugar, clotting and immunity. 

Strikingly, in Sports Medicine in particular, photobiomodulation has demonstrated increased exercise capacity and longer exercise times, as well as improved biomarkers (including reduced lactate, creatine kinase, and CRP) after exercise in athletes treated with red and infrared light. 

...and, as if that wasn't enough...

It has also been reported to release certain brain compounds that positively affect mood and sleep.

For example, the Italian researchers Raggi and Vallesi published a groundbreaking study in athletes in which they investigated the effect of blood irradiation on strength and endurance.[1] 

Published in the German journal “Schmerz & Aupunktur" in 2008, the study's authors found that athletes demonstrated remarkable physiologic benefits, including increasing their exercise performance by over 20% in multiple exercise categories from just 10 days of blood irradiation. 

What's more interesting is that they observed these effects lasted for 16 weeks after the end of the treatment! The researchers hypothesized that this duration had to do with the mean lifetime of red blood cells, which is about 12-15 weeks.    

So, we decided to leverage these findings and put them on a wrist device that would enhance compliance with its use 

By irradiating the skin on the wrist to reach the blood non-invasively, we hypothesized that we could achieve the same or at least similar results to those reported by these scientists, including improvements in sports performance and physical, mental disposition and even sleep quality.

We used red and infrared LEDs to obtain a photobiomodulating effect just as powerful as the invasive intravenous method effect used by researchers by leveraging the so-called "optical window" in tissue, which allows light to penetrate the skin most effectively. And, we also used LEDs in the violet, blue and green range.

 

There are three main reasons for the light frequency sets that the Quantlet uses: (i) the NADH-complex absorbs light in the blue range, (ii) blue and green light has an effect on HEME within red blood cells and (iii) these frequencies promote light-mediated vasodilation.[2] 

This will become more important as you keep reading...

Again, the science can get pretty thick, but what matters is that we are using the body's own capacity to perform at its best by giving it two forms of energy it can use: Light & Cold.

...But that’s not all the Quantlet will do…

The Quantlet is also designed to actively cool your blood. Why does that matter?

 

As it turns out, physical and mental functions are impaired when your body’s core temperature increases or you get hot

That is why more and more athletes are using cold to produce a performance-enhancing effect during short and intense resistance exercises.

However, research of the effects of local cooling on muscle function during exercise has produced inconsistent findings. This is likely due to the different locations and strategies being used for cooling, which range from the use of cold water or ice baths, cold drinks, gel cold packs, as well as very wildly varied timing and duration of cooling.

More importantly, the conventional cooling methods most people are using are typically applied to the skin’s surface. Because of that, they are generally ineffective at cooling the body’s core and key organs like the brain.

This is because they don’t penetrate through the body’s insulating layers of tissue. Worse than that, the cold itself can result in vasoconstriction of the peripheral blood vessels and actually cause the opposite effect rather than the desired one.  

But, everyone from Olympic trainers all the way through to the military’s Special Forces have pushed researchers to find better and more consistent ways to cool the body. 

Some of these researchers have been successful

For example, researchers at Stanford University successfully demonstrated that heat can be extracted from the body core through the palm of the hand. They accomplished this through the use of a specialized glove that uses a vacuum to negate the effect that cold has on vasoconstriction.

A challenge that remained, however, was the practicality of the device design given its size, weight and configuration. 

We thought we could find a better way to achieve similar results…and we did. 

Early test results indicate that the Quantlet’s novel, patent-pending configuration achieves most of the benefit of hand cooling without the use of a vacuum-assisted glove.

Instead, the Quantlet achieves these results by simply extracting heat through the skin of the wrist. While the thermal conductivity of skin varies, the Quantlet achieves heat transfer rates approximating those observed at Stanford through a much more practical wearable design.

The Quantlet’s Cooling Module uses electronic components called thermoelectric coolers (TECs) that leverage something known as the Peltier effect. By using a solid-state electronic mechanism to cool the body, our team removed the need for any cooling fluids and minimized the device's footprint.

Further, the Quantlet's Lighting Module stimulates vasodilation through the localized release of nitric oxide (NO) by irradiating the placement site with appropriate light frequencies. So, it does not need a vacuum pump either! This feature has the bonus effect of systemically releasing NO and enhancing oxygen uptake by helping blood vessels dilate and improving blood flow. 

Through the Quantlet’s specially designed heat-sink and cooling fan, the device achieves remarkable TEC efficiency, enabling its cooling surface to reach low enough temperatures to provide an extremely powerful heat exchange, even when operating in relatively high temperature environments. 

Our experiments with the Quantlet’s multiple iterations also helped us make improvements in the Cooling module’s heat exchange plate design and the Light module’s most optimal LED placement, power density and light frequency set to maximize the synergistic effect of Light & Cold on your body.

 

 

Impossible? Science Fiction?

 

Science, yes. Fiction, no. The Quantlet leverages medical research and well-established science in the fields of photobiomodulation, physiology and sports medicine coming from respected institutions including Harvard and Stanford.

 

 

But, WHO Exactly Will Benefit The Most From The Quantlet?

The Quantlet is ideal for those men and women who are looking for a wide-variety of benefits that have to do with their personal health and mental/physical performance including…

 

  • MMA Fighters
  • Cross-Fit Athletes
  • Rock Climbers
  • Weight Lifters
  • Runners

But the Quantlet also works well for both “everyday” men and women who simply want a way to boost their energy, overcome chronic fatigue, improve sleep, and reduce their recovery times.

 

The great thing about using the Quantlet for either improving mental/physical performance or for simple health reasons, is that it’s SUPER EASY to use and is completely painless. 

Plus, the Quantlet provides a quick and easy way to WORK NATURALLY WITH YOUR BODY to maximize your results to help you reach your weight loss or performance goals once and for all. 

 

 

“Ok, Where’s The PROOF That The Quantlet Really Works?”

As you’ve probably seen by now, there’s all types of health devices on the market promising amazing results and breakthrough “cures” to all sorts of issues. But the thing is, 99% of these devices have absolutely NO type of real backing or research (and proven results!) to back them up. 

They are more hype than anything else to make a quick buck…

The Quantlet is different. It not only leverages the PROVEN medical research and well-established science in the field of photobiomodulation, sports medicine and natural physiology from some of the most respected institutions in the world.

 

“Now’s Your Chance To Let The Quantlet SKYROCKET Your Personal Performance and Overall Health…”

If you think about all the costs and hours you put in to gain that “competitive edge” or to improve your own personal strength (and even weight loss), it can add up quickly. When you consider the costs for gym memberships, supplements, diets, and the toll it takes on your personal time…it can all add up to well over $2000 or even way more. 

Now with the Quantlet, you’ll have ONE single device that can not only help you achieve personal performance levels unlike you’ve ever seen, but also help you feel your best at the push of a single button. 

One device = One completely transformed body with accelerated performance levels!

And now you can get your hands on your very own Quantlet device for a fraction of what many photobiomodulation devices costs. Plus, it’s much easier to use and implement in your everyday life than any other device on the planet.

In conclusion...

Thanks for looking! If you love the Quantlet, or just love to see the entrepreneurial spirit thrive, please help us get this amazing project off the ground. 

Every $1 helps ... and telling people really helps, too. 

Thank you for checking out the Quantlet. 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

 

What Will We Do With Your Money?

We love the idea of involving the people directly in a communal effort to bring about this revolutionary product. We know what we need to do and we need your support to do it.

We will use your money to accelerate the execution of our product development plan. Your funds will help us make the Quantlet manufacturable. This will help us keep its production costs down and the product's price as low as possible. 

The more we raise, the more resources we can deploy to speed up getting this technology into the hands of those who need it most.

We have been listening to your comments and concerns leading up to this Indiegogo launch, and they've been very helpful in refining our thinking about the Quantlet and how to make it most useful to you. 

This is your chance to contribute directly to revolutionizing fitness and wellness. But you have to exercise your vote to change human performance. One at a time, each one of your contributions can be a powerful force in enabling us to realize this technology's great potential.

Technology and day-to-day testing

The Quantlet is an innovative breakthrough product combining different disciplines such as photobiomodulation, thermo-electric cooling, electrical and mechanical engineering, wiring, software development, physiology and sport science. We want to provide all who are as fascinated with improving their physical performance as we are, the best possible equipment in terms of quality, design and ergonomics.

We want our products to be usable in different environments and we are hence conducting rigorous testing under different conditions. We have allowed time for the tests in our plans. Nevertheless, we run the risk of prototype testing being carried out in-house identifying software or hardware bugs resulting in required adjustments and thus leading to delivery delays. 

Safety

Photobiomodulation and thermo-regulation are proven and hazard-free technologies, which are widely supported by multiple studies. Despite this, we are committed to ensuring that our products comply with the highest quality and safety standards and are safe to use. 

Providing maximum performance and reliability to our customers may result in design improvements that can be made and which may create unforeseen delivery delays.

Certifications

The delivery of the Quantlet is subject to certain certifications in specific markets. We are implementing a quality management system that supports the timely implementation of all appropriate procedures. We are familiar with the respective requirements and are supported by a dedicated team intimately familiar with international certification procedures for similar devices.

The certification process for Europe, the US and other relevant markets will begin once the final design is locked down in early 2016. We will also obtain our FCC certificate for Bluetooth communication and will complete CE Certification.

The delivery of products in Europe is, therefore, planned to start in mid to late 2016. International shipments will take place after the appropriate clearance from the relevant government bodies has been received. Even though we are confident that we are well prepared to handle the respective processes, we cannot eliminate the risk of delays due to compliance issues.

Supply Chain Risks

The Quantlet is a complex device with multiple custom components. While we have dedicated team members covering sourcing and supply chain, delays may occur if we face longer than expected lead times in the delivery of said components.

This is our first foray into consumer products - and we want to get it right. We know how to develop a product, we know how to manufacture it and we know how to distribute it.  We now simply need your help to improve our original design even faster and take the Quantlet to the next level.

That is why we are asking some of our early contributors to be a part of our Beta program. Early testers will receive a Beta version of the product to test and give us feedback. So, help us change human performance forever by participating in this campaign and getting in early to be one of the first to get a Quantlet.

Many of you have commented on our Facebook page how exciting you find the invention of the Quantlet.  We are gratified by the reaction and your enthusiasm to join us in our effort.

You have asked some good and important questions. This FAQ page will start to answer these questions and hopefully give you a deeper understanding of what we’ve done and what we plan to do. Our goal is to keep you informed and motivated to help us realize this revolutionary improvement in human performance on Indiegogo.

What is the Quantlet and how does it work?

The Quantlet is a patent-pending wearable device in the form of a flexible bracelet that applies light and cold through the skin of the wrist and ultimately to the blood. 

Using a proprietary set of wavelengths and duration of irradiation parameters developed by Quantum Dynamics, the device emits light through the skin and tissue down to the radial and ulnar arteries, as well as the wrist veins. The light applied triggers targeted, localized and controllable production of nitric oxide, a well-known vasodilator and neurotransmitter capable of enhancing physical performance by increasing blood flow. 

Nitric oxide has also been known to reduce inflammation and trigger gene expression. 

In addition, the Quantlet utilizes thermoelectric coolers (TECs) to regulate core body temperature thereby optimizing physiologic performance. A specially designed heat-sink and cooling fan enables the device to achieve remarkable TEC efficiency, enabling its cooling surface to reach low enough temperatures to become an extremely effective heat exchanger for the body, even in relatively hot operating environments. 

How do I wear the Quantlet?

The Quantlet is designed to be worn on the wrist and is sized appropriately to fit both men and women of average size.  We are experimenting with a band-extender to enable the use of the Quantlet’s light module on different parts of the body. Details for this feature are not yet available.

How long can I wear the Quantlet?

The Quantlet is designed to be worn between 5 and 60 minutes per day. Typically, users will wear the Quantlet for 30 minutes pre-exercise to maximize exercise efficiency and 60 minutes post-exercise to enhance recovery. 

There are extended use programs available for flight and sleep modes.  The Quantlet’s mobile app will notify you when it’s time to remove it after a protocol is completed.

Will the Quantlet be comfortable when worn on the wrist, especially when exercising?

We have designed, built and tested our design’s test housing in multiple scenarios, including exercise. This test housing allowed us to simulate the size and weight of the proposed completed device. Various designs were evaluated and this one far outweighed the rest.

As you can imagine, we wanted a lot from the Quantlet’s design. We wanted it to be wearable during exercise and comfortable enough to allow the user to fall and stay asleep while wearing it, while the device remained in place even through the night.

After a number of iterations, we arrived at a design that accomplishes all of these goals.

Without comfort, we knew we'd have nothing. The wrist interface is molded from a soft and pliable medical-grade silicone material. Its shape provides a gentle and flexible seal for the light and the cold being produced by the device. To assure accurate fit and maximum comfort, the device is intended to be worn by both men and women of average size.

Our test subjects indicated they found the device comfortable enough to fall asleep and stay that way until a normal awakening, such as going to the bathroom. At which time the device could remain in place until they returned to bed. Upon waking in the morning, they removed the device and rated their experience.

Continued adjustments in the shape and materials have further improved retention and comfort.

We plan to continue optimizing the design and minimizing the Quantlet’s size and weight after the Indiegogo campaign is completed and larger studies are performed.

Where does the Quantlet’s name come from?

The name Quantlet comes from the devices’ roots in quantum physics, specifically….the photoelectric effect. This was first discovered by Hertz, and then later the theory of light put forth by Einstein.

According to the photoelectric effect, when light strikes any material substance, electrons are discharged, creating a current. More simply stated, light interacts with matter as the energy of the light is transferred to that matter’s electrons. In 1905, Einstein offered an explanation for this phenomenon for which he was awarded a Nobel Prize.

How much is shipping?

Shipping is free to the US.  International orders will require an additional contribution for shipping on top of the amount paid for the Perk (please see the details listed in each of the Perks).

What is the Quantlet’s warranty?

The Quantlet is backed by a 1-year limited manufacturer's warranty. We are dedicated to your complete satisfaction. If you have any problems at all, simply contact our Support team at info@quantlets.com and we will make it right.

Is the battery rechargeable or does it need to be replaced?

The Quantlet has a rechargeable battery and its duration before recharge will vary depending on the program being used. Recharging the Quantlet will take about 60 minutes.

Can I swim/shower/immerse the Quantlet in water?

The device is designed to be water-resistant (but not waterproof) and carry an IP rating similar to that of other ruggedized devices. It’s important to highlight, though, that the device is currently meant to be worn before exercise, between sets and/or after workouts. We are conducting extensive testing to ensure we understand precisely how the device will enhance exercise during workouts. 

Why do I need this thing? Why can’t I just put my hand in an ice bucket or use any other red or infrared light source?

The Quantlet is carefully designed to provide just the right power and frequency of light along with the right amount of cold to maximize the photobiomodulation, vasodilation and cooling effects. Using any other light source would likely yield too much, too little or the wrong kind of light onto your body. Simply submersing your hand in cold water would create vasoconstriction in your hand and make cooling down more difficult.

What does wearing the Quantlet feel like?

The Quantlet creates a mild cooling sensation at the wrist that is almost imperceptible when the body is overheated. Its effects, however, are quick and noticeable. Generally, an overall sense of well-being and feeling “refreshed” follows its use.

Can I work-out less because I use the Quantlet?

The Quantlet will never replace exercise and conditioning. It will simply help you maximize your exercise efficiency and speed up your recovery times. 

Is the Quantlet a medical device?

No. The Quantlet is intended for consumer use only and is not a medical device. It is a fitness and wellness product to be used by healthy adults wanting to exercise more efficiently. In a medical overheating emergency, one should seek proper medical attention immediately. 

What physiologic parameters does the Quantlet track, if any?

Skin temperature for now. In the future, it may track others.

Why is the Quantlet funding itself through Indiegogo crowdfunding?

As many of you know, we have chosen the crowdfunding platform Indiegogo to raise the necessary funds to finalize our production-ready design of the Quantlet. Many of you have asked why we didn't go the more traditional routes like venture capital, selling the company, or finding other investors.

The short answer is this: We carefully considered all of our options. We chose Indiegogo over other options because crowdfunding is the best way to align the needs of our company and its innovative device with the interests of those of its end-users. 

For International backers, does my shipping fee cover duties/taxes?

Unfortunately, no. Like any other purchase from a retailer based in the US, we will ship as a commercial product with an invoice and any resulting duties are the responsibility of the backer. The fees collected via Indiegogo only cover the shipping fees per se.

What is the product warranty provided?

The Quantlet has a limited 90-day warranty that exclusively covers manufacturing defects. The device must be used in accordance to manufacturer instructions as included in the User Manual found here https://thequantlet.com/setup

The product warranty does NOT cover damage by the user such as broken bands, early battery failures from usage multiple times per day, and other similar circumstances.

The product warranty is not transferable if the device is resold or its ownership transfered to someone other than the individual placing the original order.

 

“Do You Still Have Questions About The Quantlet?
We Have The Answers!”

 

Please contact our Support team via email through info @ quantlets.com with any questions.

 

Risks & Challenges

We’re excited to launch the Quantlet and can’t wait to deliver it to you! We’re an experienced team of product developers and engineers and have already built several prototypes, tested the product on ourselves and sourced most of the required component manufacturers.

We're using a product development firm with years of direct experience developing and building innovative wearable and medical devices similar to ours. In spite of our best efforts, you never know what might cause delays in manufacturing (component shortages, national holidays, etc.). 

While we may not be able to promise 100% accuracy on delivery dates, we promise transparency to keep our backers informed and up-to-date on our progress.

We've put a lot on the line for this initiative. While we expect there will be twists and turns, we are committed to delivering on our promises.

 

 

[1] Raggi Francesco, Vallesi Giuseppe. Intravenous Laser Blood Irradiation in Sports Medicine. Schmerz & Akupunktur 3/2008; 34:126-129

[2] Naoya Ieda†, Yuji Hotta†, Naoki Miyata†, Kazunori Kimura†, and Hidehiko Nakagawa*†‡ Photomanipulation of Vasodilation with a Blue-Light-Controllable Nitric Oxide Releaser. J. Am. Chem. Soc., 2014. 4/2014; DOI: 10.1021

 

 

 

_________________________________________________________________________

 

The Quantlet is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease and has not been examined by the FDA or other regulatory agencies. Consult your physician before beginning any exercise program.

The Quantlet product is protected by one or more patent applications in the United States and throughout the world. The Quantlet and the Quantlet logo are trademarks of Quantum Dynamics LLC. 

 

Pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancements.

Copyright © 2015-2017 Quantum Dynamics LLC. All rights reserved.
story_txt:
ANNOUNCEMENT: Your can now place your orders directly on our website at TheQuantlet.com!Backer Shipments Are Now Complete! "You've Just Found The Most Powerful Physical Performance Improvement & Wellness Enhancement Tool Anywhere"

Honored By Being Named To The 2016 Class of The


The Quantlet's core technology gives you ALL of these benefits:
Increase exercise efficiency and capacity at the touch of a button
Extend exercise times by more than 22% without strength reduction
Achieve a higher peak force in resistance training
Attain a sense of well-being you may have not thought possible…

 

Our Story
Over a year ago, a team of 5 physicians, scientists and engineers set out to create a new kind of wearable device. This device would leverage the power of two of nature’s fundamentals: light and thermal energy and their effect on the body.This device would not simply measure your heart rate or other common fitness metrics like most other wearables do today. Rather, it would enable anyone to optimize their body’s function by simply using light and cold to ultimately revolutionize human performance.In June of 2015, the Quantlet made its debut during the keynote speech at the Voice & Exit 2015 conference by Dr. Jack Kruse, one of the Quantlet's inventors. Dr. Kruse is a respected Neurosurgeon and author of the book Epi-paleo Rx: The Prescription for Disease Reversal and Optimal Health.   There, Dr. Kruse shared his findings and explained just how he lost 133 pounds and packed on muscle in a matter of months. More importantly, he also discussed why he used light and cold to achieve his impressive results.   Specifically, Dr. Kruse revealed how the Quantlet uses a technique called photobiomodulation to deliver multiple frequencies of light into the body to achieve remarkable physical results. That’s a big word, so let’s break it down into its component parts:  PHOTO = Light. BIO = Life. MODULATION = Change. The effects of photobiomodulation were discovered over 40 years ago and have since been studied at such prestigious institutions as Harvard and NASA.Photobiomodulation has a photochemical effect (much like photosynthesis in plants). One of the main mechanisms of action occurs inside mitochondria, the energy power plant inside every cell. Photobiomodulation's effects depend on the application of the appropriate wavelength and density of light, delivered to the target tissues for a specific period of time.Most of the scientific evidence for photobiomodulation has focused on its impressive effects on tissue repair (skin wounds, muscle, tendon, bone, nerves), but also on how it reduces inflammation and eradicates pain wherever light of particular characteristics is applied. (PubMed refs)According to peer-reviewed scientific literature, light acts at the cellular level by stimulating cells to generate more energy and utilize oxygen more effectively. Within certain blood-based cells exist mitochondria, which produce cellular energy in the form of a molecule called adenosine triphosphate or ATP for short. An enzyme in mitochondria known as cytochrome c-oxidase (CCO) utilizes light's photons to increase ATP and reduce oxidative stress. A cascade of mitochondrial and intracellular downstream effects then lead to astounding results including tissue repair and reduced inflammation. (Pubmed refs)
What Has Been Largely Missed Is That Photobiomodulation Can Also Enhance Athletic Performance
In multiple studies conducted across the globe in countries such as Germany, Russia, China, and Brazil, investigators have long noted that when using specific frequencies and intensities of light for the irradiation of blood, subjects in those studies have shown improvements in lipid levels, cholesterol, blood sugar, clotting and immunity. Strikingly, in Sports Medicine in particular, photobiomodulation has demonstrated increased exercise capacity and longer exercise times, as well as improved biomarkers (including reduced lactate, creatine kinase, and CRP) after exercise in athletes treated with red and infrared light. ...and, as if that wasn't enough...It has also been reported to release certain brain compounds that positively affect mood and sleep.For example, the Italian researchers Raggi and Vallesi published a groundbreaking study in athletes in which they investigated the effect of blood irradiation on strength and endurance.[1] Published in the German journal “Schmerz & Aupunktur" in 2008, the study's authors found that athletes demonstrated remarkable physiologic benefits, including increasing their exercise performance by over 20% in multiple exercise categories from just 10 days of blood irradiation. What's more interesting is that they observed these effects lasted for 16 weeks after the end of the treatment! The researchers hypothesized that this duration had to do with the mean lifetime of red blood cells, which is about 12-15 weeks.    So, we decided to leverage these findings and put them on a wrist device that would enhance compliance with its use By irradiating the skin on the wrist to reach the blood non-invasively, we hypothesized that we could achieve the same or at least similar results to those reported by these scientists, including improvements in sports performance and physical, mental disposition and even sleep quality.We used red and infrared LEDs to obtain a photobiomodulating effect just as powerful as the invasive intravenous method effect used by researchers by leveraging the so-called "optical window" in tissue, which allows light to penetrate the skin most effectively. And, we also used LEDs in the violet, blue and green range. There are three main reasons for the light frequency sets that the Quantlet uses: (i) the NADH-complex absorbs light in the blue range, (ii) blue and green light has an effect on HEME within red blood cells and (iii) these frequencies promote light-mediated vasodilation.[2] This will become more important as you keep reading...Again, the science can get pretty thick, but what matters is that we are using the body's own capacity to perform at its best by giving it two forms of energy it can use: Light & Cold....But that’s not all the Quantlet will do…The Quantlet is also designed to actively cool your blood. Why does that matter? As it turns out, physical and mental functions are impaired when your body’s core temperature increases or you get hot
That is why more and more athletes are using cold to produce a performance-enhancing effect during short and intense resistance exercises.
However, research of the effects of local cooling on muscle function during exercise has produced inconsistent findings. This is likely due to the different locations and strategies being used for cooling, which range from the use of cold water or ice baths, cold drinks, gel cold packs, as well as very wildly varied timing and duration of cooling.
More importantly, the conventional cooling methods most people are using are typically applied to the skin’s surface. Because of that, they are generally ineffective at cooling the body’s core and key organs like the brain.
This is because they don’t penetrate through the body’s insulating layers of tissue. Worse than that, the cold itself can result in vasoconstriction of the peripheral blood vessels and actually cause the opposite effect rather than the desired one.  
But, everyone from Olympic trainers all the way through to the military’s Special Forces have pushed researchers to find better and more consistent ways to cool the body. 
Some of these researchers have been successful
For example, researchers at Stanford University successfully demonstrated that heat can be extracted from the body core through the palm of the hand. They accomplished this through the use of a specialized glove that uses a vacuum to negate the effect that cold has on vasoconstriction.

A challenge that remained, however, was the practicality of the device design given its size, weight and configuration. 
We thought we could find a better way to achieve similar results…and we did. 
Early test results indicate that the Quantlet’s novel, patent-pending configuration achieves most of the benefit of hand cooling without the use of a vacuum-assisted glove.
Instead, the Quantlet achieves these results by simply extracting heat through the skin of the wrist. While the thermal conductivity of skin varies, the Quantlet achieves heat transfer rates approximating those observed at Stanford through a much more practical wearable design.
The Quantlet’s Cooling Module uses electronic components called thermoelectric coolers (TECs) that leverage something known as the Peltier effect. By using a solid-state electronic mechanism to cool the body, our team removed the need for any cooling fluids and minimized the device's footprint.
Further, the Quantlet's Lighting Module stimulates vasodilation through the localized release of nitric oxide (NO) by irradiating the placement site with appropriate light frequencies. So, it does not need a vacuum pump either! This feature has the bonus effect of systemically releasing NO and enhancing oxygen uptake by helping blood vessels dilate and improving blood flow. 

Through the Quantlet’s specially designed heat-sink and cooling fan, the device achieves remarkable TEC efficiency, enabling its cooling surface to reach low enough temperatures to provide an extremely powerful heat exchange, even when operating in relatively high temperature environments. 
Our experiments with the Quantlet’s multiple iterations also helped us make improvements in the Cooling module’s heat exchange plate design and the Light module’s most optimal LED placement, power density and light frequency set to maximize the synergistic effect of Light & Cold on your body.
 
 
Impossible? Science Fiction?
 
Science, yes. Fiction, no. The Quantlet leverages medical research and well-established science in the fields of photobiomodulation, physiology and sports medicine coming from respected institutions including Harvard and Stanford.
 

 


But, WHO Exactly Will Benefit The Most From The Quantlet?
The Quantlet is ideal for those men and women who are looking for a wide-variety of benefits that have to do with their personal health and mental/physical performance including…
 

MMA Fighters
Cross-Fit Athletes
Rock Climbers
Weight Lifters
Runners

But the Quantlet also works well for both “everyday” men and women who simply want a way to boost their energy, overcome chronic fatigue, improve sleep, and reduce their recovery times.
 


The great thing about using the Quantlet for either improving mental/physical performance or for simple health reasons, is that it’s SUPER EASY to use and is completely painless. 
Plus, the Quantlet provides a quick and easy way to WORK NATURALLY WITH YOUR BODY to maximize your results to help you reach your weight loss or performance goals once and for all. 
 
 
“Ok, Where’s The PROOF That The Quantlet Really Works?”

As you’ve probably seen by now, there’s all types of health devices on the market promising amazing results and breakthrough “cures” to all sorts of issues. But the thing is, 99% of these devices have absolutely NO type of real backing or research (and proven results!) to back them up. 
They are more hype than anything else to make a quick buck…
The Quantlet is different. It not only leverages the PROVEN medical research and well-established science in the field of photobiomodulation, sports medicine and natural physiology from some of the most respected institutions in the world.


 


“Now’s Your Chance To Let The Quantlet SKYROCKET Your Personal Performance and Overall Health…”
If you think about all the costs and hours you put in to gain that “competitive edge” or to improve your own personal strength (and even weight loss), it can add up quickly. When you consider the costs for gym memberships, supplements, diets, and the toll it takes on your personal time…it can all add up to well over $2000 or even way more. 


Now with the Quantlet, you’ll have ONE single device that can not only help you achieve personal performance levels unlike you’ve ever seen, but also help you feel your best at the push of a single button. 
One device = One completely transformed body with accelerated performance levels!
And now you can get your hands on your very own Quantlet device for a fraction of what many photobiomodulation devices costs. Plus, it’s much easier to use and implement in your everyday life than any other device on the planet.
In conclusion...


Thanks for looking! If you love the Quantlet, or just love to see the entrepreneurial spirit thrive, please help us get this amazing project off the ground. 
Every $1 helps ... and telling people really helps, too. 
Thank you for checking out the Quantlet. 


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
 
What Will We Do With Your Money?
We love the idea of involving the people directly in a communal effort to bring about this revolutionary product. We know what we need to do and we need your support to do it.
We will use your money to accelerate the execution of our product development plan. Your funds will help us make the Quantlet manufacturable. This will help us keep its production costs down and the product's price as low as possible. 
The more we raise, the more resources we can deploy to speed up getting this technology into the hands of those who need it most.
We have been listening to your comments and concerns leading up to this Indiegogo launch, and they've been very helpful in refining our thinking about the Quantlet and how to make it most useful to you. 
This is your chance to contribute directly to revolutionizing fitness and wellness. But you have to exercise your vote to change human performance. One at a time, each one of your contributions can be a powerful force in enabling us to realize this technology's great potential.
Technology and day-to-day testingThe Quantlet is an innovative breakthrough product combining different disciplines such as photobiomodulation, thermo-electric cooling, electrical and mechanical engineering, wiring, software development, physiology and sport science. We want to provide all who are as fascinated with improving their physical performance as we are, the best possible equipment in terms of quality, design and ergonomics.
We want our products to be usable in different environments and we are hence conducting rigorous testing under different conditions. We have allowed time for the tests in our plans.
