story:
Hello my name is Ron Triebels

Having personal experience with relatives that are diabetics, I know the importance of proper foot care. Having diabetes puts you at a significant risk of developing major foot problems from Peripheral Neuropathy to Ulcerations. When untreated, these problems can result in serious infections or even loss of limbs.

I was very excited when the opportunity presented itself to create a Diabetic Sock using Zinc ions spun into the yarn that would actually fight bacteria. More importantly the difference this diabetic sock could make for people with diabetes. To get started, we desperately need your support to help us fund this program. This money will go to creating the Antimicrobial Yarn (Z-Guard), Create Socks for Men, Woman and children that have a Designer look to them.

FACT: Per the American Diabetes Association, there are over 80,000 amputations performed in the USA per year. Most of these amputations are Diabetes related.

FACT:  According to the ADA comprehensive foot care can reduce amputations by 45% - 80%. Wearing Diabetic Zinc Socks featuring Z-Guard Zinc ion yarn could make a big Difference for people with diabetes.

HERE’S HOW THE SOCK WORKS: The part of the foot that sweats the most is the Toe, Sole and Heel. That’s because that’s the part of the foot that sits in the shoe. When bacteria comes in contact with the bottom of the Diabetic Zinc Socks, the Zinc ions in the yarn instantly prevent the growth of the bacteria’s buy cutting off its oxygen supply, thus preventing it from colonizing (growing ) in the sock.

Shown below, The Toe, Sole and Heel of the Diabetic Zinc Socks is made from 100% Natural Cotton, Bamboo and Zinc Ions ( Z-Guard Yarn) all Spun together and are biologically active which damage key enzyme systems in the cell membranes of bacteria. This gives the fibers the ability to wipe out virtually all Superbug Bacteria with protection that's built in. Does not rub off

LABORATORY TESTED vs SUPERBUG MRSA BACTERIA with PROVEN RESULTS:

Shown below, is a test done by the NAMSA Test Facility of the Z-Guard Antimicrobial fabric for one of the most difficult of the current crop of "Superbug Bacteria" namely MRSA (Staph). The results were outstanding. 500,000 MRSA Microbes were wiped out on CONTACT!

DIABETIC SOCK COMPARISON: 

OUR GOAL:

The goal is to raise over $40,000.00. This will give us the ability to purchase the raw materials to spin the Z Guard yarn, custom dye the yarn and have enough starting inventory to create (20) sock designs. We would like to offer Diabetic Zinc Socks for Men, Women and Children Socks. If we do not reach our entire goal we will use the contributions we do receive to further our process.

HOW CAN YOU HELP

Your donation is most important as it will go to helping people with Diabetes. People with diabetes around the world will be able to purchase our Diabetic Zinc Socks on line and know that they are getting a sock that can give them protection against bacteria. The Diabetic Zinc Sock can be a real game changer for diabetics. If you are unable to contribute financially please share this information and our campaign to anyone you can. We appreciate any help and support you are able to give us and diabetic people around the world.

story:
Our Story

Wrestling teaches confidence, courage, determination and the importance of teamwork. Walnut High School wrestling has thrived under coaches Cecil Sebastian, Darrell Sebastian and Paul Hirigoyen. Together, they produced CIF champions four of the past five years. 

What We Need 

The reason we're starting this campaign is to help raise funds so our wrestlers can continue on the path to success. With the current state of the economy and continuing budget cuts, our fundraising efforts are more important than ever. WHS Wrestling is in dire need of a new wrestling mat. Unfortunately, a new wrestling mat costs approximately $8,000. All money raised through this campaign will be used to purchase a new wrestling mat, and any excess funds will go towards other expenses incurred throughout the season, such as tournament fees, transportation costs, and team uniforms. 

The Impact

Wrestling mats have two sides: a competition side and a practice side. The practice mat has smaller practice circles to separate partners wrestling from their teammates, which is a very important safety feature. The current practice side is completely worn down is unfit to be used, which forces the wrestlers to practice on competition side. Having a new wrestling mat allows the team to conserve their competition mat and practice on the practice side that has proper practice circles. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help our campaign by spreading the word using the link above "share this campaign" with your friends and family.

story:
Short Summary

Lilla Korman has spent a lifetime helping others, from being a AmeriCorps Vista coordinator,to taking care of foster children, to countless hours in the school systems as a volunteer, to working with Special Needs Students. Lilla in 1990 took early retirement to provide full time care for her terminal husband who also spent many years volunteering in the community. Lilla currently lives on a small Social Security retirement, in a small rural community in North Florida. Currently she doesn't have reliable transportation that can provide transportation to medical appointments and do basic necessities like go grocery shopping. We are looking to raise $4,500.00 to purchase a used but dependable truck for the family to provide much needed transportation in a area where the closest Walmart is 60 miles round trip, and where her many doctors are up to 200 miles round trip, in an area where there is no public transportation. Please help Lilla's family to remain independent so they can enjoy their Golden years without worring about their breaking down.

What We Need & What You Get

Lilla Korman needs a Used Dependable car that can provide much needed transportation to keep up with her Doctors appointments and shopping to maintain a independent lifestyle , in a rural community with no public transportation. We currently need $4,500.00 that will purchase a late model truck  to assist a retiree to get around for Medical appointments and treatments and for grocery shopping. This Truck is a late model low mileage vehicle to replace a car that is currently no longer dependable to make the 60-200 mile trips for her medical Care or the 60 miles for grocery shopping. The truck we wish to acquire has been well maintained and should not be a financial burden that her current non-functional car has been. Your help here will remove the uncertainty of her current unreliable car.

The Impact

From your family to ours. You contribution will have a huge impact on an 86 year old widower to enjoy her retirement years without having to worry about if she has transportation to the Doctor or Grocery Store.

Other Ways You Can Help

Knowing the economy is tight out there for many people, if you can not help financially you can be A big help by sharing this fundraising campaign with your family and friends. The more this is shared, the greater chance we can fund this goal. Please also Keep Lilla Korman in your prayers that she finds much needed transportation and continues to have good health in her retirement years. Thank you!

story:
Support our sport: Archery

We’re building a huge, modern and awesome sports facility, designed specifically for archery, in the Olympic Capital of Lausanne, Switzerland.

The World Archery Excellence Centre is designed to be a hub for the worldwide development of the important Olympic sport of archery. It’s a facility designed for archers, by archers, to be used for archery at all levels.

It’s a place not just for the elite, but for all with a passion for the sport. And that’s why, now the building’s nearly complete, we’re offering the chance for people in Lausanne, in Switzerland and from around the world to support this incredible project. Be a part of something truly powerful, support our sport.

Why we’re Crowdfunding

A multi-million dollar project that’s been nearly a decade in the making, the World Archery Excellence Centre is nearly finished. Every cent, dime and penny we raise will go towards putting the finishing touches to the inside of the building: From technology to tapestry (not really, but maybe some paintings), we’re putting all the money we raise directly into the facilities visitors at the centre will use.

But it’s not really about the money.

Archery, like all sport, is a huge community. More than anything, we want the whole archery family to have the opportunity to be involved in this project. After all, it’s being built for you.

In return for your support, we’re able to offer a number of opportunities to have your name go down in history (on site), or to pick up one of the exclusive souvenirs we’ll produce. 

See the perks you can purchase to the right!

Learn More

Want to find out more about the World Archery Excellence Centre? Visit our website: www.worldarcherycentre.org – and don’t forget to like, share and tell all your friends!

See you in Lausanne… soon. :)

story:
Short Summary

Hello Everyone,

I am Leandra Jackson, owner and massage therapist at Peak Spa and Wellness, LLC.  Soon we will be expanding into a bigger space with more health oriented modalities to serve our community with.  The name of the business has changed from Leandra's Touch Therapy.  Our added modalities will be nutrition counseling, esthetic skin care, and of course we will always have our fabulous massage techniques.  We specialize in nueromuscular, deep tissue, sports massage, lymphatic massage, prenatal massage,  hot stone massage, sugar and salt scrubs, and body wraps. 

The importance of this campaign is to raise money for the expansion.  This will cover some renovation costs, supplies, and furniture for the new space.  We want to reach out to the entire community and let them know we are here for them and to help them live a more pain-free, stress-free, and healthy life. Your contribution today could mean the difference in helping thousands of people every year.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the deal:

  • Renovation cost: $3500
  • Treatment Supplies: $1000
  • Office Supplies: $500
  • The skills that the staff st Peak Spa and Wellness are vast and uncompareable in the massage industry!
  • If the entire goal is not reached the funds will go to the supplies that are needed  for our spa and esthetic programs .

The Impact

Your contribution could mean the difference between us moving to the larger space and being able to offer our services to more people in the community:

  • This project is valuable because as a society we have become sick with diseases like heart disease, diabetes, cancer, and obesity.  This is a chance for us to reach out to people and share the difference between living a healthy life rather than in sickness.
  • To date our massage therapy skills have helped numerous people heal from injury, chronic pain and dysfunction, and emotional healing.
  • The future holds the ability for us to expand our massage therapy skills and include other modalities of nutrition counseling and esthetic skin care so that we may serve the mass of our community.

Risks & Challenges

 As with any adventure there are some risks, but we are determined to not allow them to break us down but make us stronger.  A challenge that we foresee is ensuring that there is a continuous stream of patrons. Another challenge is to find the people that are going to be a great fit for the staff here at Peak Spa and Wellness, LLC. 

  • To overcome this we will encourage word of mouth referrals with a referral program and a continuous stream of communication with the community.
  • We will be in need for an administrative assistant.  We hope to increase business enough to hire more massage therapists and estheticians by 2016.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute money to our adventure there are other ways you can help:

  • Contact us for some promotional items that you can share with your friends and family. 
  • Share / Forward this link to others who may want to contribute!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
**Thank you so much for all of your help! Extra funds from this campaign will go towards improving adherence in adolescents through maintaining camp sustainability, as well as purchasing supplies for the Bristol-Myers Squibb Phatsimong Adolscent Centre**

Summary

The Botswana-Baylor Children’s Clinical Centre of Excellence (COE) is a public-private partnership between the Government of Botswana and the Baylor College of Medicine’s Baylor International Paediatric AIDS Initiative (BIPAI). Since 2003, the COE has provided free-of-charge, state-of-the-art paediatric HIV care, treatment, and support to children throughout Botswana.  Currently the COE provides care to 2,404 patients from Greater Gaborone and over 4,000 Batswana children at its outreach and mentorship sites.

Due in part to the success of the national rollout of antiretroviral treatment (ART) in Botswana, the population of adolescents living with HIV (ALHIV) has grown drastically over the past decade. The WHO reported in 2013, however, that HIV-related deaths among adolescents increased by 50%, while the global number of HIV-related deaths fell by 30%. Most of these deaths are caused by issues with adherence to ART. 

Camp Ya Chesa!

The COE started Teen Club--a support group held the last Saturday of every month--in response to the growing ALHIV population in Botswana. Teen Club has been internationally recognized as a UNICEF Best Practice and was selected for inclusion in USAID's AIDSTAR-One Promising Practices Database. As an extension of Teen Club, the COE would like to provide teens with a camp this year to help address issues with medication adherence.

In choosing campers from the COE clientele, a strong preference was given to adolescents in challenging psychosocial situations who have significant problems with medication adherence, including orphans and vulnerable children (OVC).

We have been partially funded by a local game reserve here in Gaborone, but still need help with funding other basic needs. We received funding about 2 weeks ago, and camp starts on the 14th of December...please help us reach our goal!

What We Need

In order to run a successful, safe, and supportive camp, we hope to provide our clients with:

  • Transportation to and from camp
  • Camp T-shirts
  • Supplies to tie dye shirts
  • Journals and pens
  • Materials to make vision boards and collages
  • Volleyballs and other games
  • Supplies for a campfire (including s'mores!)
  • Chocolate milk to help mitigate the side effects of ART
  • Other materials for arts and crafts

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your colleagues, friends and family!

story:
Hailing on all frequencies!

We are Urbandroid Team - you know us as the authors of Sleep as Android, the #1 sleep monitoring app on Android.

Sleep Phaser is the tricorder for your sleep. It's the thing all the sleep health advocates have been waiting for.

  • It tracks your sleep phases.
  • It's contactless and comfortable. Sleep Phaser sits on your bedside table. No wires. No hardware in your bed.
  • The sensor is passive. No high-energy radio! Monitoring works via passive infrared detection. The main deflector dish stays offline.
  • It's a beautiful reading smartlight.

We have no desire for investors to tell us what we should do or how the thing should look. Instead, we believe that with your support, we can deliver Sleep Phaser to you in the fastest and most transparent way.

What you'll find below

  1. The tech behind Sleep Phaser
  2. Why Sleep Phaser
  3. How it's used?
  4. Breath rate detection
  5. Timeline
  6. Perks!

The tech behind Sleep Phaser

We have teamed up with Happy Electronics, a manufacturing company from the Czech Republic, with whom we already successfully produce other hardware such as Mindroid Glasses and Sleep Masks.

At the heart of Sleep Phaser is a passive infrared sensor that senses how your body heat changes. We have developed a set of algorithms which enable us to translate the minute heat changes into knowledge about your sleep phases. In an ideal setting, Sleep Phaser can also detect your breathing rate (see details below). 

 

Sleep Phaser uses an USB connector for the power supply.  In the box, you will get a USB charger. 

Unfortunately we had to drop smartphone charging feature since there was too much powerline interference that was scrambling the activity monitoring. 

Sleep Phaser connects to Sleep as Android (full license included with Sleep Phaser) to use its extensive arsenal of features:

  • Smart alarm that wakes you up at the perfect moment
  • Long-term sleep analysis with statistics
  • Cloud app for backup and desktop access to your data
  • Google Fit & Samsung Health integration
  • Automatization via Tasker and IFTTT
  • Dedicated support

 

NOTE: You need an Android phone to monitor sleep with Sleep Phaser.

Only the plastic chassis of the Sleep Phaser is manufactured in China, internal electronics are added in the heart of Europe - Czech Republic.

  • Circuit boards for Sleep Phaser are printed in the Czech Republic

 

 

  • All the components are soldered onto the circuit boards in the Czech Republic as well

 

 

  • Finally, every Sleep Phaser is completed by hand in the factory shop of Happy Electronics, in Prague, Czech Republic

 

 

Why Sleep Phaser?

Compared to other standalone sleep tracking solutions, Sleep Phaser is:

  • comfortable and simple to set up (no plastic discs in bed, no special mattress needed, nothing to wear, just a bedside light)
  • inexpensive (less than half the price than some of the competing products)
  • not radio-based (only low-energy Bluetooth is used to connect to your smartphone, whereas the sensor itself is infrared-light-based)
  • beautiful, slim in design

How it's used?

In the evening, you go to bed to digest a few pages of the book you've been reading lately.

At this point, you can either turn on the light directly by a hardware button to get a (hardware-dimmable) white light - or put your phone into a charger to ​start up paused sleep tracking automatically.

When you go to sleep, just turn off the Phaser by the hardware button and sleep tracking will un-pause. In the morning, you'll get woken up in the light sleep phase by a sunrise effect (a light slowly brightening up from 0 (at red colour) to 100% brightness (at orange-white-ish colour).

We've also received some requests to change the hue/brightness at will, so we'll release a separate light control app for the Sleep Phaser in case you just want to control the light but not do sleep tracking. 

Breath rate detection

The passive infrared sensor in Sleep Phaser is so sensitive it can measure breathing. In an ideal setting, this translates to a blue line with your breath frequency trend. Below is a chart of detected breaths from our testing:

That's a whole night of tracking with Sleep Phaser - the horizontal line at 20 is where we detected breathing reliably.

And this is how it will look in Sleep as Android (these particular screenshots is from using sonar sensor with Sleep as Android, you can see that the breath detection has some momentous gaps):

The timeline

  • 2016 December - the idea was born. We started working on a proof of concept.
  • 2017 February - a prototype was built.
  • 2017 April - we named the thing Sleep Phaser :) and continued perfecting the algorithms.
  • 2017 October - IndieGogo campaign launch
  • 2018 February - first batch shipping

Perks!

Sleep Phaser comes in two packages: SINGLE and DUAL. 

DUAL Sleep Phaser is a compact package of two Sleep Phasers for partners. Put one Sleep Phaser on each side of the bed to monitor sleep for both yourself and your partner.

Both SINGLE and DUAL packages also come as Super Early Bird and Early Bird perks. Don't miss your chance to score a bargain!

Risks & Challenges?

Urbandroid Team is no one-hit wonder. We are a well-established enterprise which keeps its cash flow positive at all times. We are already manufacturing and/or selling customized electronics such as the Sleep Mask or Pulse oximeter for Sleep as Android worldwide in a partnership with Happy Electronics. We have warehouses in both Europe and the U.S.

Sleep long and prosper!

story:
Bacterial infections are mostly treated with a prescription of medicines called antibiotics. However, harmful bacteria can change and resist to these antibiotics. The infection is harder to treat as antibiotics become less effective. Antibiotic resistance is an increasing threat to global health. The UK government predicts that a continued rise in drug resistance bacteria would lead to 10 million people dying every year by 2050. Treatable illnesses, such as pneumonia, tuberculosis, salmonellosis, blood poisoning or minor infections could become lethal. 

We are a team of 17 students with 13 different nationalities taking part in the international Genetically Engineered Machine competition hosted by the MIT Massachusetts Institute of Technology, in Boston. By combining our skills in microbiology, engineering and design, we are happy to represent the City of Stockholm at the iGEM Giant Jamboree. The annual iGEM competition challenges students to design, create and implement a project about synthetic biology. This year we have decided to address the issue of antibiotic resistance. 

Research has found an alternative treatment for bacterial infections called Phage Therapy. Bacteriophages are viruses found in the environment that evolve along with their bacterial prey. They only target bacteria, not our own cells and are therefore good candidates for bacterial infection treatments.  Phages have two distinct lif​cycles, the lytic cycle - where they are active -and the lysogenic cycle - where they are dormant. Current phage therapies uses virulent phages that are maintained in the lytic cycle. They attach to bacteria, inject their DNA, and replicates inside the host cell until the burst of the bacteria. 

Unfortunately, phages encounter many chemical and physical barriers on their way to the site of infection. At the end, only a small number of survival phages reach the bacterial infection showing high variance in efficacy. That’s why, current treatment are not therapeutically viable yet. 

This is when our team comes in the picture. Our team is working with temperate bacteriophages that can reach both the active and dormant states. The second life cycle of phages is the lysogenic cycle. In that case, the phage lay dormant in the bacteria. We are creating a molecular switch that can control the two life cycles of a phage. We can direct the phage into the lysogenic cycle if we want it dormant on the way to the site of infection. Once the phage has reached its target, we can force it to enter the lytic cycle and thus kill the harmful bacteria. By inserting the phage in a harmless carrier bacteria we would make sure it travels through the body without being damaged. 

Our project is named after the great female scientist Esther Lederberg who first discovered the first temperate phage - the Lambda phage - and greatly contributed to science progress in synthetic biology. And we believe this tribute will resonate with a more general recognition of women in science. With our project Esther we want to contribute in making phage therapy a safe and more sustainable treatment to help save millions of lives.

In order to have enough resources to finish our project in time and present it at the Giant Jamboree in Boston, we still need a 30,000 SEK extra fundings for:

- Scientific Material: to cover the order of genetic sequences, primers and enzymes - 18,000 SEK

- Human Practices Material: to cover the expenses of communication tools (video, documentary, flyers, posters) - 7,000 SEK

- Team Promotion: to cover the purchase of iGEM Stockholm merchandise (hoodies, stickers) for the Giant Jamboree - 3,250 SEK

- Indiegogo Platform Fees - 1,750 SEK

story:
Learn Your Stress Triggers: When, Where and Who...

The WellBe is an elegant, light-weight bracelet and mobile app designed to support your emotional well-being. Find out what your stress triggers are and learn personalized meditation and other well-being exercises to release stress  immediately.

The WellBe models: black, dark brown and natural, with or without the flow symbol

As Seen On:


It's All About How You Feel

The WellBe bracelet monitors your heart rate and uses a patent pending algorithm to determine your stress and calmness levels based on time, location and people you meet throughout your day. Crafted from cork, the WellBe bracelet is lightweight, durable, and soft against your skin.

Convert Stress into Calmness 

The WellBe app allows you to get an overview of your stress triggers, and offers personalized stress reducing programs to help you retain a calm state of being. Our app offers a variety of mindfulness exercises such as:

  • Meditations

  • Focused Breathing 

  • Guided Imagination

  • Personalized programs and playlists

Our app also offers programs for 7, 14 and 21 days from renowned mentors through the Mentors Channel, all designed to encourage you to adopt well-being as a habit.

Less Stress - Better Health - Slower Aging

Stress has been scientifically proven to have negative impact on human life, generating negative health implications such as headaches, fatigue, sleeping disorders, digestive problems, high blood pressure, heart diseases, aging and obesity. The longer the stress lasts, the worse it is for both your mind and body and the more difficult it is to recover. 

Mindfulness and meditation have been proven as highly effective ways to release stress and have many positive effects on sleep, productivity as well as lasting good feeling. A recent study from Harvard University suggests that meditation is influencing the grey matter in the brain and thus allowing better aging of the brain and the body.

Seeing is Believing 

The WellBe measures the changes in your stress/calmness levels while practicing the different stress release exercises, allowing you to see the 'before and after' effect of each program you practice. 

Personalized Playlist of Well-Being Exercises

Based on the analysis of your stress/calmness levels before and after the meditations you practice the WellBe app offers you a personalized playlist of programs and meditations that are likely to have the most positive effect on you. 

Relaxation is Good - WellBe Makes it a Habit

The WellBe app also offers many programs geared towards helping you remain calm regardless of circumstances. These programs include 7, 14, and 21 days plans coming from renowned mentors through our partnership with Mentors Channel and they are all designed to deal with all those stressful aspects of life which are keeping us away from our natural calm state of being.
These plans will remind you to meditate every day and will slowly but surely bring you back to the quiet space that always exist within you and for you. Practice makes perfect and the WellBe was designed as a tool that would make it easy for you to retain calmness as an ongoing state of being.  
 

The Perfect Time to Take a 5-Minute Break

The WellBe app is receiving your stress/calmness information from the WellBe bracelet on an hourly basis. You can set the app to send you an alert when your stress level exceeds a certain level and this alert will also include an effective exercise or meditation that would allow you to reduce stress and restore your calmness immediately.

How About a Hug from a Tree?

We put careful consideration into the material selected to create the WellBe bracelet. We thought that the WellBe users do not need yet another screen in their lives. We wanted to make our bracelet as environmentally-friendly as possible. So plastic and silicon were out of the question. Eventually we discovered cork! Cork is a beautiful, strong and durable material and it feels wonderful when touched by the human body. Cork is a natural material and peeling it off from an oak tree supports the growth of the tree. If you love nature and trees you can see it as being hugged by a tree when wearing the WellBe.

Various Models and Colors

We have created the WellBe in a black, dark brown and natural colors and you can select the model that fits you best with or without the flow symbol:

Who We are and Why We Made It

The WellBe was developed by entrepreneurs with a tremendous passion for well-being. We believe that whatever we want in life is because we believe we would feel good when having it. With the WellBe we can turn a negative emotional momentum into a positive one and achieve that good feeling we desire regardless of the achievement of the actual object. We also believe that by sustaining a good calm feeling we are then more likely to achieve those things we want from life.

The Co-Founders of WellBe are Zach Sivan and Doron Libshtein, both are seasoned executives in the hi-tech industry as well as published authors in the well being space. Together with our team we demonstrate dozens of years of experience in mobile technology, mobile health solutions and digital well being solutions and our aggregated expertise has come together now to create the WellBe.  


What We Need & What You Get

We have invested substantial time, money and efforts in the last year to research, design and develop the WellBe concept. We worked with experts to design the specifications of the WellBe hardware and software, we interviewed numerous providers for the WellBe hardware and mobile app, we hired industrial designers, graphic designers, user interface designers and the best creative minds to come up with a solution that is both pretty and efficient. We are now ready to manufacture and deliver the WellBe solution and for this we need your help in raising the needed funds for the following tasks: 

  • Manufacture the heart rate monitoring hardware, for which we have selected a top provider.
  • Execute the development of the stress detection and measuring algorithm, for which we came up with a unique, patent pending concept!
  • Develop an iOS and Android mobile app based on an extraordinary user interface that we have designed
  • Engage with various providers we researched for meditation, breathing and mindfulness programs
  • Engage with selected list of renowned thought leaders and mentors for inspiring sessions that will be included with the app
  • Purchase the cork, metal and other needed material that make the design of the bracelet and its package



Frequently Asked Questions

What is the WellBe?

The WellBe is a digital bracelet designed to support and promote balanced well being for people in hectic and busy environments. The WellBe is using a heart rate monitor and a mobile app to detect and determine your stress level based on time, location and people you meet and then it offers variety of meditation and other wellbeing exercises to release stress and help you calm down immediately.

How does it work?

The WellBe Bracelet is using heart rate monitoring sensors that tracks your heart rate for 3 minutes every hour. The WellBe app includes a proprietary, patent pending algorithm, which analyzes heart rate variability to determine your stress level based on time, location and people you meet. The app asks your permission to access your location and calendar so it can display your stress levels based on time, location, events and people you meet. You can also set the WellBe app to notify you when stress level is too high and such notification will also offer variety of balancing exercises to release stress immediately.

Why is it important to detect and release stress?

Mindfulness and meditation has been scientifically proven as highly effective ways to release stress and have many other positive effects as better sleep, being more productive and benefit from a lasting good feeling. A recent study from Harvard University suggests that meditation is influencing the grey matter in the brain and thus allows slower aging of the brain and the body. The WellBe app is making the most of this ancient wisdom by providing users with easy tools to access this wisdom in the very right time and the right place.

Okay, so I'm stressed, what now?

The WellBe is not just about detecting stress but instead focusing on providing the solution! The WellBe app is offering a large variety of mindfulness exercises such as breathing, guided imagination and meditations that are all designed to bring you into relaxation within minutes. Moreover, the WellBe also offers variety of meditation plans for 7, 14 and 21 days to help you adopt a more serene routine. The WellBe also integrates classes and guided meditations from world class mentors that enhances users well being on an ongoing basis.

The WellBe studies your body’s reactions to different meditations and breathing techniques and can recommend personalized exercise which are likely to have the most positive effect on you.

All in all, the WellBe bracelet and the WellBe app work in concert to convert negative emotions into positive ones and helps you maintain your emotional well-being on a day to day basis.

What is the WellBe bracelelt made of?

We wanted to create a digital product, as much as possible, out of natural materials. So plastic and silicon were out of the question and we weren't sure about leather too, being an animal made material. And then we found cork! Cork is a beautiful, natural material which is both strong, durable and feels wonderful on the human body and we chose it as the basis for the WellBe bracelet. For the metal parts we chose high quality polished stainless steel to create an elegant and beautiful design.

Also, the WellBe bracelet is designed to allow users to easily replace the design of the bracelet whenever they want while keeping the hardware and just replacing the bracelet itself.
What is the size of the WellBe strap?
We have designed the WellBe strap in two sizes to fit different wrist sizes:
  • Large - at a length of 9.5 inches (24.13 centimeters)
  • Small/Medium - at a length of 8 inches (20.32 centimeters)
Both straps are adjustable for your wrist size and the selection of size will be done at the end of the campaign. 

Who are you?

The WellBe was founded by a group of entrepreneurs combining unique expertise in well being, mobile apps and heart rate monitoring technologies. All the components making and integrating the WellBe bracelet and mobile app were carefully developed and selected by our team members to create a state of the art solution, which is based on scientific tools and at the same time pleasant to use  and supports the ongoing well being of its users.

Risks & Challenges

While we have identified and very well researched all the technologies related to the WellBe project we still have not assembled them together into the full and complete product. The integration and assembly process of the different components of this project may reveal challenges that are currently unknown prior to beginning of execution and the project. Nevertheless, we have identified and it is our intention to work with people and companies that already proven their abilities and expertise in the relevant field related to their role in the project and we feel confident that our objectives would be achieved. In addition, the management team of the WellBe is well experienced in complex implementation project and we all feel confident that we can achieve our goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course backing our project by selecting one of the perks we offer is a very effective way to support our project and we are very grateful for that. We do understand however that backing is not always an option for everyone and we appreciate any other help one would be generously willing to offer.
Our main challenge is spreading the word and here are a few effective ways to support this effort: 
  • Share the WellBe video or link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Instagram, tumblr or any other social network you subscribe to
  • Forward the link and the information by email to your friends and acquaintance and ask them to do the same
  • Tell us about blogs or other media channels that could be interested in writing or talking about the Wellbe. Our PR team will be happy to reach out and provide them with everything they need to spread the word.

We are now ready to manufacture and deliver the WellBe solution and for this we need your help in raising the needed funds for the following tasks:   Manufacture the heart rate monitoring hardware, for which we have selected a top provider.

Execute the development of the stress detection and measuring algorithm, for which we came up with a unique, patent pending concept!
Develop an iOS and Android mobile app based on an extraordinary user interface that we have designed
Engage with various providers we researched for meditation, breathing and mindfulness programs
Engage with selected list of renowned thought leaders and mentors for inspiring sessions that will be included with the app
Purchase the cork, metal and other needed material that make the design of the bracelet and its package





Frequently Asked Questions

What is the WellBe?
The WellBe is a digital bracelet designed to support and promote balanced well being for people in hectic and busy environments. The WellBe is using a heart rate monitor and a mobile app to detect and determine your stress level based on time, location and people you meet and then it offers variety of meditation and other wellbeing exercises to release stress and help you calm down immediately.
How does it work?
The WellBe Bracelet is using heart rate monitoring sensors that tracks your heart rate for 3 minutes every hour. The WellBe app includes a proprietary, patent pending algorithm, which analyzes heart rate variability to determine your stress level based on time, location and people you meet. The app asks your permission to access your location and calendar so it can display your stress levels based on time, location, events and people you meet. You can also set the WellBe app to notify you when stress level is too high and such notification will also offer variety of balancing exercises to release stress immediately. 
Why is it important to detect and release stress?Mindfulness and meditation has been scientifically proven as highly effective ways to release stress and have many other positive effects as better sleep, being more productive and benefit from a lasting good feeling. A recent study from Harvard University suggests that meditation is influencing the grey matter in the brain and thus allows slower aging of the brain and the body. The WellBe app is making the most of this ancient wisdom by providing users with easy tools to access this wisdom in the very right time and the right place.
Okay, so I'm stressed, what now?The WellBe is not just about detecting stress but instead focusing on providing the solution! The WellBe app is offering a large variety of mindfulness exercises such as breathing, guided imagination and meditations that are all designed to bring you into relaxation within minutes. Moreover, the WellBe also offers variety of meditation plans for 7, 14 and 21 days to help you adopt a more serene routine. The WellBe also integrates classes and guided meditations from world class mentors that enhances users well being on an ongoing basis.The WellBe studies your body’s reactions to different meditations and breathing techniques and can recommend personalized exercise which are likely to have the most positive effect on you.All in all, the WellBe bracelet and the WellBe app work in concert to convert negative emotions into positive ones and helps you maintain your emotional well-being on a day to day basis.
What is the WellBe bracelelt made of?We wanted to create a digital product, as much as possible, out of natural materials. So plastic and silicon were out of the question and we weren't sure about leather too, being an animal made material. And then we found cork! Cork is a beautiful, natural material which is both strong, durable and feels wonderful on the human body and we chose it as the basis for the WellBe bracelet. For the metal parts we chose high quality polished stainless steel to create an elegant and beautiful design.Also, the WellBe bracelet is designed to allow users to easily replace the design of the bracelet whenever they want while keeping the hardware and just replacing the bracelet itself.What is the size of the WellBe strap?We have designed the WellBe strap in two sizes to fit different wrist sizes:

Large - at a length of 9.5 inches (24.13 centimeters)
Small/Medium - at a length of 8 inches (20.32 centimeters)

Both straps are adjustable for your wrist size and the selection of size will be done at the end of the campaign. 

Who are you?
The WellBe was founded by a group of entrepreneurs combining unique expertise in well being, mobile apps and heart rate monitoring technologies. All the components making and integrating the WellBe bracelet and mobile app were carefully developed and selected by our team members to create a state of the art solution, which is based on scientific tools and at the same time pleasant to use  and supports the ongoing well being of its users.
  Risks & ChallengesWhile we have identified and very well researched all the technologies related to the WellBe project we still have not assembled them together into the full and complete product. The integration and assembly process of the different components of this project may reveal challenges that are currently unknown prior to beginning of execution and the project. Nevertheless, we have identified and it is our intention to work with people and companies that already proven their abilities and expertise in the relevant field related to their role in the project and we feel confident that our objectives would be achieved. In addition, the management team of the WellBe is well experienced in complex implementation project and we all feel confident that we can achieve our goal.
  Other Ways You Can HelpOf course backing our project by selecting one of the perks we offer is a very effective way to support our project and we are very grateful for that. We do understand however that backing is not always an option for everyone and we appreciate any other help one would be generously willing to offer.
Our main challenge is spreading the word and here are a few effective ways to support this effort: 


Share the WellBe video or link on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Instagram, tumblr or any other social network you subscribe to
Forward the link and the information by email to your friends and acquaintance and ask them to do the same
Tell us about blogs or other media channels that could be interested in writing or talking about the Wellbe. Our PR team will be happy to reach out and provide them with everything they need to spread the word.

story:
My Goal

Hi! My name is Andrea Olson. I am 25, married and an Environmental Chemist working for the government in Indiana. Last May, my mom, who lives in Texas and who is ONLY 46, was diagnosed with Stage 3 colorectal cancer. Her story is below but basically for almost 10 months she has been through chemo, radiation, and different surgeries resulting from the tumor in her colon. Throughout this struggling time, she was newly spoused but her husband hasn't had the opportunity to be by her side due to a deployment to Afghanistan. He left for training before her tumor removal surgery and was deployed last August and won't return until this coming August. Throughout these months, she has been on an emotional roller coaster thinking her cancer was gone but then was recently told in February that her cancer had metastasized into her liver and lung and she was now upgraded to Stage 4. The doctor has given her 6-8 months to live without treatment. She is researching several clinics who could really help her but most are not covered by her insurance since she is finding alternative ways for treatment other than chemo.

 

With this month being National Colorectal Cancer Awareness month, I want to spread awareness and help raise money for my mom's treatment costs. I believe with more treatment she could beat the statistics and live for much longer than two years because of her age and good health. My goal is to run every mile at the Mini Marathon in Indianapolis and ask for donors to support me by donating any amount for how many miles they think I can run. I have never ran the Mini or 13.1 miles at that but will be training my butt off for the next two months and will wear a shirt supporting my mom everytime I run the trails/streets in my town. Any donations up until the Mini are acceptable and greatly appreciated also!

My mom's treatment could cost her anywhere from  $400-$1,000/day and ANY amount of money is greatly appreciated. I set my goal to $5,000 in order to expect small and dream big. I would love to pay for all of her treatment but my husband and I work for the public and it doesn't pay as much as you would think.

 

What We Need From You...

We need anything that you are willing to give:

  • Monetary donations (100% of all proceeds go to Mom's treatment!)
  • Spreading the word to all your friends or family members on Facebook or simply giving them this link so they can read about this extremely noble cause
  • Your thoughts and prayers

What I'm Doing for the Cause

  • I will be training for 2 months, prepping for the Mini in Indianapolis.  Anybody can donate any amount of money per mile that I run without stopping.
  • I will also be spreading the word and going from place to place telling my mom's story to build support for her.
  • T-shirts have been designed by us to wear while training around the town of Plainfield to share the awareness.

The Impact

There are many reasons your monetary donation is important:

  • My mom is waiting to start treatment until money is available
  • Payment is due per procedure so raising all the money I can is Vital
  • There is no telling how long it will be for us to start treatment without donations

Her Story

Hi my name is Felicia Player,( Lisa)
I have been diagnosed with stage 3 Colorectal Cancer and here is my story..
First of all I want to say Thank you God for giving me breath and the strength to be able to endure today and have the strength to write this story..
I am a 46 year old female a newly spouse of Michael Player, who is currently deployed to Afghanistan with the Military.
I am a mother of five beautiful children and one Awesome grandson who is 11 years old.
On May 2, 2012 a trio to the Emergency Room, started a different pathway to a life that I have always taken for granted, a life that I thought I would  grow old and gray, sitting on the front porch in a rocking chair with my Husband looking around at the kids and grandkids and talking about the memories we have shared over the years that we have been together.
On May 2, 2012 that vision was quickly changed. My husband, at the time was currently deployed to Germany for a month long mission. I found myself alone at home feeling very nauseated and having severe abdominal cramps. I thought laying down for a while might subside the symptoms, but after a few hours the symptoms was getting worse and I started to feel faint. Since being all alone, I started getting really scared and called the ambulance before I blacked out. By the time I reached the hospital, my symptoms were even worse. I couldnt imagine what was going on with me. Being there by myself and going through all these symptoms, I just wanted to be near my husband and kids.
The Dr after a few hours was able to subside my symptoms and I started feeling better. The Dr came in with the results of the testing that was ran and stated it just looked like a severe case of constipation, and I thought all of that pain just because I had to use the bathroom?
The the Dr said when they did a scan they had found some darken areas that he was concerned about and ordered a colonoscopy, to make sure nothing else going on..So the trip to the ER landed me a overnight stay in the hospital..
The next day the procedure was performed..As I awoke from it, I looked over and there set my Dr right next to me holding my hand and then I looked into his face and out came the life changing words, the most devastating news that at that point changed the pathway to my life
forever. He said I am sorry to tell you this, but you have stage 3 Colorectal Cancer. The tumor was so big he couldnt even do the Colonscopy it was blocking the entrance of my colon.At that point, I thought, I am just not fully awake from the Anesthesia and it was just a bad nightmare, So I shook my head and asked the Dr what he said again, and he then repeated the diagnosis. A rush of every emotion imaginable filled my body and I thought No this cant be, I am to young, I have five kids and a grandson that desperately need me, a newly husband I was planning on spending the rest of my life with and at that moment, that vision of sitting on the front porch old and gray in the rocking chairs with my husband was shattered. I yelled No as the tears was streaming down my face, this cant be happening to me. At that moment I looked around and realized I was by myself and all I wanted was to see my husband, my kids and my family and have them near.
A week went by doing all of the neccesary preparation for the surgery for the tumor removal and the 5 lymph nodes that were affected.
Then the big day came May 7th 2012 for the surgery. Surgery was very lengthy, much longer then anticipated.The tumor was removed along with the effected lymph nodes. That next week was grueling going through recovery..But Michael was finally do home in a week so it really helped getting through it. I had a month to spend with him before he was taken back up for deployment but this time to Afghanistan and it was going to be for over a year.The Dr stated I needed to do Chemo and Radiation therapy as a preventive measure and that would be starting around the time he was to leave. So for the next month I tried to enjoy as much time with him and my family while recovering from surgery. The month flew by very quickly and before you knew it the time had come for him to leave and the treatments to start which was all on the same day.The next 2.5 months was very rough. My body did not handle both treatments at the same time very well to the point I had to quit therapy for two weeks to let my body recover..The treatments ended in August. I was told I was cancer free..At that point I had totally started changing my diet, doing alot of research on healing my body and making it healthy again by taking natural supplements, juicing eating lots of fruits and vegetables etc. I was finally starting to feel human again after several months.But I was starting to have difficulting eating anything heavy like meat, pasta and breads and digesting it so my diet was starting to basically get down to where I can only eat salads..
A few months went by and still having eating problems. And another scan was scheduled to check on the remission of the cancer which was done in end of November.. I felt positive and thought everything was going to come back ok, but everything came to a big surpirise when the  Dr came in and said that the cancer had Metastize and now moved into my liver and lungs with the cancer now being upgraded to stage 4  cancer.
I finally seen a Gastro Dr for my eating problems and he said basically everything according to the xrays was a mess up in there. So The first of three Colonoscopy has been scheduled to go in and dilate my colon opening so I can pass my food since the opening was a size of a pin hole originally. The Dr had stated that even though he was able to temporary help me, looks like a another surgery was going to be needed to repair the damage from the previous one.And at this point Another Colon surgery is scheduled in a few weeks.
In the mean time I had decided to try and get hooked up with another Oncologists for the metastizing of the cancer and since the previous scan at the time was a few months old another one was ordered which was just done in February of 2013 with the shocking results of the cancer has gotten alittle worse with the masses alittle larger in the spotted previous areas. The Dr at that time gave me 6-8 months without treatment to 2 years with treatment. Once again, my body felt a rush of different emotions, and the tears once again came a pouring down. And  all visions of my future felt like a door that just slammed shut.. I felt sick and I cried, God why? Why me? Why is this happening? The Dr stated that since I have been having so much issues with my digestion and have lost so much weight that I needed to get my colon fixed first before my body can deal with any type of treatments..So any type of treatments are now postponed until I have surgery and recover for a while after that for healing..Its like a ticking time bomb waiting to explode. I need to get fixed to eat and need to start treatments to fix the cancer..
In the mean time I have now been doing alot more reading and researching on different alternatives to try and keep everything at bay. For which I have found a clinic in another state that does offer alot of different alternatives to help people in my situation to help prolong and improve their lives with my condition. Unfortunately insurance doesnt cover these treatments since alot of them are still in the trial stages..I did visit the clinic about a week or so go. It was a very good and positive visit with good things said on helping me get my health and immune system back in the right direction ..
I went a head with what little savings I had and paid for a couple days of treatment..Wow, it was well worth it.. I felt even better that what I have felt in a long time..But these treatments just like having chemo or anything else is very pricey and insurance not covering these like they do the other methods, then it has made it difficult to be able to get the treatments that would help improve my health for the time being since they can run anywhere from $400- 2000.00 dollars a day which I definitely do not have that kind of money especially with all of the Military cuts that have been just recently done.
I am not sure what Gods plan is for my life.. I am a newly married Military spouse for which my husband was taking from me just as I was diagnosed and he is still gone with no return until July..I just pray to God that he opens a door to help me find away to stay alive and help me find a resource to get treatments to maintan and prolong my life until my husband comes home and maybe take the honeymoon we wasnt able to take and also giving me the opportunity to live a longer life to see my grandkids grow up. And hopefully fulfill that vision of sitting on the porch in that rocking chair  old and gray watching the kids and grandkids talking about the past memories we have shared with my loving husband..
Thank You!!

story:
A Personal Message from Malcolm McLean


                                                         

                                                    4Eyes Innovator & Founder


I developed this product from my own frustrations of not being able to find nice looking or quality made sunglasses with a bi-focal reading element, and realized all my friends had the same problem too.

I, like most people, have a favorite brand and style of sunglasses that suits me, and they have expensive coated lenses that make everything look clearer and crisper, and bring out colors beautifully - but the optician wanted to switch out those lenses for cheap tinted glass to add a bi focal lens and charge me $140.00!

I ended up putting my reading glasses over my sunglasses - and looking completely goofy and then I saw my friends doing the same thing! LOL             

          


As they say "Necessity is the Mother of all Inventions'  So I set out to design an easy to use, easy to apply, reading lens that are optician quality and fit all types of sunglasses and safety glasses and are inexpensive.

I love solving problems and creating new products and after 20+ years in the fiber optic industry, I am mustering all that experience to create this wonderful innovative product - 4Eyes Bi -Focal Stick On Reading Lenses

So if any of those images remind you of yourself - then
 "You don't need reading glasses - You need 4Eyes"

     

                                   

                    


BTW - I'm having a ball - it's so exciting creating something new and innovative - and especially when people say to me:


      'WOW, why hasn't someone                          created this before?"


                                                  Fashion Sunglasses

 

Celebs need help in reading too,  although none of them are endorsing 4Eyes - Yet!

                                    Even Work and Laboratory Safety Glasses

                                                       Driving and Sports


They work perfectly on any type of lens - " Blue Blockers' 'Yellow Driving Glasses' 'Polarized' 'Mirrored' 'UV coated' - any type of lens without altering the performance of the lens.




4Eyes fits any style of sunglasses -  'Dirty Harry' wrap around, long narrow, 'Top Gun' aviators, 'Italian movie mogul', Jackie Onassis oversize, retro, or any style or design of frame - even safety and laboratory glasses!


                             Watch this short clip for the explanation:



I spent a lot of time on the design working with some of the smartest plastics and adhesive experts in the world - thank you Professor Nasiri - and the engineers at BASF Plastics and 3M Adhesives division  - making sure that the design fits all types glasses, and positions and sticks easily without any bubbles - even in high temperatures and humidity.    

                                                   

                                                        


                                

      Co-Founder Prof. Nasiri in the clean room with our very first 4Eyes prototype

Mohsen is Lean Manufacturing ( TPS) and Six Sigma - Certified Lean Six Sigma Sensei - which means he forecasts all needed materials for manufacturing and packaging.

He is also Project Management a PMI Certified Project Management Professional
TQM (Top Quality Management) and ISO 13485, ISO9000, QS9000, cGMP, 510(k)  Certified Internal Auditor - which means he is one of the few people in California qualified to audit medical, industrial and military grade manufacturing and supply chain controls in materials, equipment, process, production and quality!

He lectures in S. California and is an expert in fiber optics, military and space optics and specializes in exotic plastics and substrates.

So you can be assured that 4Eyes production is under the very best production and quality control!

So at 60 years of age, I am off on a new adventure with my great friend and co-founder Professor Mohsen Nasiri - creating a brand new product to help people like myself who just want to be able to chose their style, quality and performance of sunglasses and add a reading element to them easily and inexpensively.


       My Warranty and Guarantee 

4Eyes never fade or yellow, they are UV protected and waterproof and for good measure I gave them a lifetime warranty - if anything goes wrong just send them back to me and I'll replace them free of charge - even 20 years from now!

                                                       




 Why is 4Eyes The Best Bi-Focal Lens?

                        It's all about 'Linear Eyes Movement'


We read from left to right and so I designed 4Eyes to be long in shape to accommodate out eye movement with a low profile so it is easier to see over the lens for long distance. 



  Why Do People Hate Bifocal Glasses?

             Because they probably tried on a badly designed pair!


                  Look at these terrible 'official' designs of BiFocal lenses!!

         


We read from left to right - and our eye movement is linear - horizontal - back and forth.

If the bi-focal lens is positioned badly, or the wrong size for the lens, or a bad shape, then our eyes will 'catch' the edge and disrupts our focus and eye movement and disorients our vision - very dangerous when driving or working.

If the D shape is too big (tall) then our eyes 'catch' the top edge when we are trying to see over the lens for distance - again very dangerous when driving.


         The First Bi-focal Glasses

Believe It or Not - it was Benjamin Franklin that designed the first 'bi-focal' glasses in 1750!

                                                      


He took two round glass disks, polished one to magnify and left the other clear then cut them both in half and put the 'D' shaped magnifying lens on the bottom and the clear on the top and wired them together!

There are still companies trying to peddle this out of date badly designed 'D' shape to consumers - they haven't progressed from 250 years ago - and are completely inappropriate for modern day glasses.


            

                           Ben Franklin's real bi-focals at the Smithsonian Museum



                   World Class Manufacturing

Our manufacturing partner has decades of world class manufacturing, achieving the highest certification for a medical device manufacturer audited and approved by the International Standards Organization in Geneva Switzerland – ISO 13485.

In addition to that certification they also are FDA registered and approved to manufacture medical devices – which includes reading glasses and our 4Eyes bifocal stick on reading lenses – to extremely high medical standards.

All reading glasses imported or manufactured in the USA must have FDA registration and approval before they can be sold either online or in retail stores.  

                                                               

http://www.fda.gov/MedicalDevices/DeviceRegulationandGuidance/GuidanceDocuments/ucm150001.htm


    Why I am reaching out to you 

I am using this marvelous new platform - "indiegogo crowd funding" - to support the very first production run of 4Eyes

I have already personally invested into the design and the first prototype - what I need are the pre-order support from you!


                                        



               What do they cost?

My target retail price for High Street and Department stores are $24.99 + 

The special indiegogo price is for early adopters who want the very first pair of 4Eyes and be able to say you were one of the very first to discover and support this new innovation and company.

What I need now is for you to  pre-ordering them - at the special indiegogo price of just $13 a pair or 2 pair for $25 or 3 pair for $30 and I will  include your State Tax and  free S&H to the first 500 pre-orders for anyone in USA (sorry rest of world you have to pay international postage - but they are Tax Free).

The pre-orders will fund the first production run and 'proof of concept' 

               Get your pre-orders in early!


                    Be Then First to Support this American Innovation

                                   

                                     Putting America back to work!

Our first run will be for one magnification, with the other three runs right after - so please get your pre-orders in early!

                           Indiegogo asked me:

        "What does this campaign  means to me" 


     I created 4Eyes because there is an obvious need and want - and I could not have invented 4Eyes in my 30's - I had to wait until now when I need them!

    It will be an immense validation to me, and I hope an inspiration to others who are  the same age, that we can put our experiences to good use - creating new and innovative products.

    My vision (pun intended) is to make 4Eyes into a World Wide  'Made in America' brand (World Wide Patents Pending) and perhaps - with your help - create history in being the most pre-ordered product in crowd funding history!

    I know that not all of you will need or want 4Eyes - but if you believe in this product and my goals -  may I ask you to share this site or my website www.4eyes4eyes.com on your favorite social media sites and 'friend' 'like' 'Pin' and < heart> me to your friends and colleagues and 'followers'.

    Please also use indiegogo's 'share' button and turn your friends on to 4Eyes!


                                    **********  'GOOFY' SELFIES **********

    Oh and one other thing - Please send  'SELFIES" of you or friends wearing reading glasses over their sunglasses and looking 'completely goofy' like I used to, and post them on my 4Eyes Face Book page (just for fun).

                                        Thank You 


                                     Malcolm McLean
story_txt:
A Personal Message from Malcolm McLean


                                                         
                                                    4Eyes Innovator & Founder


I developed this product from my own frustrations of not being able to find nice looking or quality made sunglasses with a bi-focal reading element, and realized all my friends had the same problem too.
I, like most people, have a favorite brand and style of sunglasses that suits me, and they have expensive coated lenses that make everything look clearer and crisper, and bring out colors beautifully - but the optician wanted to switch out those lenses for cheap tinted glass to add a bi focal lens and charge me $140.00!
I ended up putting my reading glasses over my sunglasses - and looking completely goofy and then I saw my friends doing the same thing! LOL             
           


As they say "Necessity is the Mother of all Inventions'  So I set out to design an easy to use, easy to apply, reading lens that are optician quality and fit all types of sunglasses and safety glasses and are inexpensive.

I love solving problems and creating new products and after 20+ years in the fiber optic industry, I am mustering all that experience to create this wonderful innovative product - 4Eyes Bi -Focal Stick On Reading Lenses
So if any of those images remind you of yourself - then
 "You don't need reading glasses - You need 4Eyes"
     
                                   
                    
BTW - I'm having a ball - it's so exciting creating something new and innovative - and especially when people say to me:

      'WOW, why hasn't someone                          created this before?"

                                                  Fashion Sunglasses
 

Celebs need help in reading too,  although none of them are endorsing 4Eyes - Yet!


                                    Even Work and Laboratory Safety Glasses
                                                       Driving and Sports




They work perfectly on any type of lens - " Blue Blockers' 'Yellow Driving Glasses' 'Polarized' 'Mirrored' 'UV coated' - any type of lens without altering the performance of the lens.




4Eyes fits any style of sunglasses -  'Dirty Harry' wrap around, long narrow, 'Top Gun' aviators, 'Italian movie mogul', Jackie Onassis oversize, retro, or any style or design of frame - even safety and laboratory glasses!

                             Watch this short clip for the explanation:







I spent a lot of time on the design working with some of the smartest plastics and adhesive experts in the world - thank you Professor Nasiri - and the engineers at BASF Plastics and 3M Adhesives division  - making sure that the design fits all types glasses, and positions and sticks easily without any bubbles - even in high temperatures and humidity.    




                                                   



                                                        



                                
      Co-Founder Prof. Nasiri in the clean room with our very first 4Eyes prototype
Mohsen is Lean Manufacturing ( TPS) and Six Sigma - Certified Lean Six Sigma Sensei - which means he forecasts all needed materials for manufacturing and packaging.
He is also Project Management a PMI Certified Project Management ProfessionalTQM (Top Quality Management) and ISO 13485, ISO9000, QS9000, cGMP, 510(k)  Certified Internal Auditor - which means he is one of the few people in California qualified to audit medical, industrial and military grade manufacturing and supply chain controls in materials, equipment, process, production and quality!
He lectures in S. California and is an expert in fiber optics, military and space optics and specializes in exotic plastics and substrates.
So you can be assured that 4Eyes production is under the very best production and quality control!


So at 60 years of age, I am off on a new adventure with my great friend and co-founder Professor Mohsen Nasiri - creating a brand new product to help people like myself who just want to be able to chose their style, quality and performance of sunglasses and add a reading element to them easily and inexpensively.



       My Warranty and Guarantee

story:
Short Summary

From time to time we need to be reminded of where we came from, how we got here and who has helped along the way.  NOW IS THAT TIME!

  • I am Shawn Leonard, a life long friend of the Holdaway Family.
  • I am putting this little fund raiser together, with lots of help, to ease some financial burden that the Holdaway family is going through..
  • ALS states that the average family with an ALS patient has an ~AVERAGE~ OF $100,000.00 worth of bills throughout the process.  Please Help!


What We Need & What You Get

 

We do Not have a specific Financial goal.  The Primary goal is to get Friends & Families together while Marlene is still with us!  The financial help is secondary but Much needed.  There is no guarantee That Marlene will be able to attend, but we are very hopeful she will rally on the 25th of October.  If so, please be patient while talking to her.  It is very hard for her.  HUGS go a long way :)

The Impact

 

We have almost all done the Bucket challenge and maybe the ALS walks, but this money will go specifically to help the Holdaways get through this horrible disease.


 

Other Ways You Can Help

Show up...Hugs, stories, hand shakes and a Toast to being fortunate enough to have had some kind of impact from The Holdaway Family!   Love all of you guys!!!!

story:
This February of 2015, a group of 14 nurses, doctors, scientists and researchers will embark on a trip to Fonfrede, Haiti with Jean Pierre-Louis, Founder and Executive Director of CapraCare.  April of 2015 will mark CapraCare's 6th year anniversary as an organization.   

Since the inception of CapraCare, we continue to learn from our past efforts.  Our U.S team and Haitian team, along with the community we serve share this pragmatic approach, which ensures consistency and stability. During the weeklong journey, our U.S team will conduct meetings with the organization's Community Advisory Members; our staff working in Haiti, community partners and leaders, the people we serve, and other stakeholders.  As an organization, we believe that nothing should be done for the community without direct community involvement. 

This trip will allow a group of physicians, nurses currently attending the B.S.N program at Monroe College in Bronx, NY and its nurse administrators to share their skill with the Haitian team and provide care of the community of Fronfrede. Additionally, an environmental health professor at Brooklyn college will be leading a mosquito prevention project with a group of her students who are currently working towards their masters in public health.

Since 2009, despite ever-changing challenges, CapraCare has put together a dynamic group of 20 core Haitian staff volunteers, who have received extensive heath care education and who have developed the skills necessary to promote and sustain improved health outcomes for the 20,000 people living in the rural community of Fonfrede, Haiti. CapraCare has continued to demonstrate that the organization's programs have been making an impact by saving lives and maintaining local capacity in Fonfrede, Haiti. 

If you never believed in positive change in Haiti, CapraCare is now your reason to believe. Your continued support will help the organization provide access to basic health services to 20,000 Haitians in need. 

Please help CapraCare raise $2,500 to help support the efforts of the U.S team during their week of work within the community in Fonfrede, Haiti. 

A donation as small as $1 or as much as you are able will support the following: 

  • Assist more than 20 community members of CapraCare’s staff to develop leadership skills
  • Promote community awareness of health care issues to 20,000 Haitians in Fonfrede, Haiti
  • Enhance the coordination of health care services among NGO’s serving Haitians to prevent the duplication of services

About CapraCare:

CapraCare is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization whose mission is to develop sustainable community health programs assisting school-aged children 5-19 years old and their families living in Fonfrede, Haiti.  Fondrede has a population of 20,000, whose families were severely impacted by the 2010 earthquake. CapraCare provides a host of professional services ranging from access to healthcare and social services, to low-threshold mental health education and counseling.

 For more information on CapraCare, please visit: www.capracare.org

story:
Getting Crimson Elite To US Quidditch Cup 9

It's that time of the year again: Time for fabulous quidditch merchandise in exchange for helping the Crimson Elite attend the largest tournament of the year. 

The Utah Quidditch program is one of the longest standing and most successful quidditch programs in the west, and we need your help to get our team to the 9th annual US Quidditch Cup in Columbia, SC. The Crimson Elite have worked hard this season to make the best possible showing at this amazing tournament, we just need your help getting them there. The elite have had a great tournament track record this season, including a first place finish at Tree City in Idaho and an invitation to the Bat City Showcase in Texas. It's shaping up to be the Crimson Elite's best year yet. 

But it's not all about us. This fundraiser is the best opportunity to get all the Utah Quidditch related merchandise you could hope for. We're offering limited time jerseys, stickers, and other goodies perfect for players and fans alike.   

What You Get

We've put together some awesome perks for Utah Quidditch fans. Check out the gallery tab for images of the perks:

  • $8 Goodies! Your choice of one of these four goodies to show your support: A bumper sticker with the UT Quidditch logo or with the "I Drive Stick" graphic; a UT Quidditch wristband; or a UT Quidditch button. 
  • $9 Custom Shot Glasses with the the Utah Quidditch logo.
  • $10 Dedicated Video from our superstar Abbie Simons, customized for each supporter. You can subscribe to her snapchat stories for free, which are better than cable. 
  • $12 Painting of the logo of your choice: Utah Quidditch, Crimson Elite, or Crimson Fliers. 
  •  $14 Goodies x 2! Pick two of the four options of goodies ($8 perk) at a discount.
  • $15 T-Shirts! Pick from one of two shirt options: The brand new Utah Quidditch logo or the fan favorite "More Balls than Your Sport" shirt. 
  • $15 Framed Picture of some of our best known members with a custom message from each. You may choose from the scrappy Dan Howland, the sassy Sequoia Thomas, the legendary Dan Hanson, or...Dakota Briggs. 
  • $18 Goodies x 3!?! Pick THREE of the goodies ($8 perk) at an even larger discount.
  • $20 Custom Pint Glass with a laser engraved image of the UT Quidditch logo. We refuse to drink from anything else. 
  • $20 ALL OF THE GOODIES !!! Receive all of the goodies at the largest discount. Pop pop! 
  • $35 Jigsaw Puzzle featuring a photo of the Crimson Elite roster. 11" by 14" with 252 pieces. Cute! 
  • $35 Custom Snapback Hat! A red and black snapback with the Utah Quidditch logo. 
  • $40 Dedicated Cheering Squad for your team at US Quidditch Cup 9! The Crimson Elite will come and cheer your team on with a level of pep you didn't even know existed. We're talking pep that would make even Devon Anderson jealous.  Availability schedule during the tournament will be posted soon. 
  • $70 Player Jersey from the Crimson Elite or Crimson Fliers! Choose a specific player on either of the teams and we'll send you a jersey identical to the jerseys we wear on the pitch.
  • $80 Custom Jersey with a name and number of your choice! These may be in the style of either Utah Quidditch team. 
If you can't donate, help us out by sharing this campaign with anyone you think might be interested. 

What This Means To Us

Money raised through this campaign will go directly towards the funding of travel and housing for Crimson Elite players and coaches. In the event there is money left over we will reinvest it directly back into the Utah Quidditch program to help fund future UTQ hosted tournaments such as Crimson Cup and the ever-popular Snow Cup. Utah Quidditch is a grassroots organization and no individual benefits directly from the money made from this fundraiser. 

The amount of time put in by all members of Utah Quidditch on top of our other responsibilities is often staggering, but our love for this nutty sport trumps any stress it may cause. 

Every little bit helps. Thank you for helping us fund our passion. 


*We will email you about the specifics of your perks after the campaign ends in order to make sure everything is as you desire.
