story:
What We Need & What You Get

To start this endeavor we are asking for $13,000. this money will be put straight into setting up the clinic with the best water filtration and restructuring equipment available. There is also some light remodeling that needs to happen to get the water into the room and a sink and vanity that need to be put in.  We will need a computer or iPad and a printer to help with tracking transactions, processing payments, scheduling, etc.  In addition to the nuts and bolts, the clinic will be set up in a warm and inviting manner so that people are able to relax before and after treatments and during consultations.  Anything remaining will be used to start a small in-house store that will have the best products available to support clients on their healing process and to help with maintaining the space during the startup process.  


Donation Perks

• For a $9 donation We offer our sincere gratitude and appreciation for helping us help others! We'll also  keep you updated on the status of the clinic.

• For a $27 donation you receive a custom flower essence to support your emotional well-being. This can be done for you no matter where you are, and will be shipped to your home. We'll also  keep you updated on the status of the clinic.

  • For a $54 donation you will get our Gentle Ayurvedic Cleanse.  A PDF booklet created by us, that takes you through a gentle yet thorough Ayurvedic cleanse. *cleansing supplies not included. We'll also  keep you updated on the status of the clinic.

• For a $81 donation you receive One Colonic or one in-office or distance Core Treatment. Yes! Distance treatments are real and effective! Plus, A custom flower essence blend to support your emotional well-being. This can be done for you no matter where you are, and will be shipped to your home. We'll also  keep you updated on the status of the clinic.

  • For a $108 donation you’re entitled a Treatment and Cleanse.  One Colonic or one in-office or distance Core Treatment. Yes! Distance treatment is real and effective! Plus, a PDF booklet custom created by us for our clients, that takes you through a gentle yet thorough Ayurvedic cleanse. *cleansing supplies not included. We'll also  keep you updated on the status of the clinic.

  • For $540 you get the Deluxe Health Transformation, which is a 6-month pass to RoseHeal. It includes the Gentle Ayurvedic Cleanse, monthly flower essence, colonic and core treatment for 6 consecutive months. A $1020 value! *Treatment timeframe can be condensed, schedule permitting, cleansing supplies not included.

  • For a $1080 donation you receive the Ultimate Health Transformation Package. This consists of an annual pass to RoseHeal. This includes monthly flower essence, colonic and core treatmenst for 12 consecutive months and the Gentle Ayurvedic Cleanse. A $2040 value! *Treatment timeframe can be condensed, schedule permitting, cleansing supplies not included.  • And the The LIfetime Membership is yours for $13,000!!!  As long as we are practicing and you're alive we will give you one colonic and Core Synchronism treatment per month (12 each per year) PLUS 20% off all other products and additional services!


About Us

  Hello, this is Daniel Healey of RoseHeal. Thank you for your interest in our campaign to start an integrated health clinic. RoseHeal is the combined practices of myself and my wife Sunny Rose Healey.  Together we offer Ayurvedic Medicine, Colon Hydrotherapy, Core Synchronism, Reflexology, Polarity Therapy, Flower Essence Therapy and Womens Health. When we met in 2007 as students at The Ayurvedic Institute in Albuquerque, NM, we’d both come from deep roots in yoga. Sunny owned a successful yoga studio in Salt Lake City, and I’d been teaching several years in  North Carolina. In 2009 Sunny received her certification as an Ayurvedic Practitioner and joined the faculty at the Ayurvedic Institute. She currently manages the Institute’s clinic, teaches Ayurvedic Medicine in multiple institutions, is working on a degree in holistic midwifery and apprenticing to be a midwife. She plans to provide a full range of women’s health services based on Ayurvedic principles.  

I followed my passion for hands-on therapy and went to the New Mexico School of Natural Therapeutics to get my massage license.  This program introduced me to and deepened my understanding of many healing modalities such as Polarity, Cranial Sacral Therapy, and Core Synchronism which is a combination and expansion of the two developed by Robert Stevens ND, as well as Reflexology, Flower Essences, Natural Therapeutics and Colon Hydrotherapy.  The heavy influence of Polarity Therapy at NMSNT was the drawing factor and finding Robert and Core, I feel, was Divinely inspired.  Since graduating I’ve completed all 7 levels of training in Core Synchronism and am now a Certified Practitioner. I’ve had a private massage and bodywork practice since 2009.  

A few years ago, I had the opportunity to apprentice with Bill Haggard and learn from his 30 plus years experience of Colon Hydrotherapy.  He has developed a gentle gravity fed colonic system with the ability to use water with varying Ph levels and additives to support the body in greater detoxification.  Although I enjoy practicing all of what I have learned individually, I find that blending modalities has had the deepest impact on the healing process for my clients.  Through my work with colon hydrotherapy, I’ve met many individuals who are at crossroads– with nowhere to turn, looking for healing and a sense of peace.  They’ve exhausted most medical and holistic resources and without relief.  I love working as a colon therapist – it affords me the opportunity to practice in combination, all that I have learned.  By doing Core, massage and Reflexology in conjunction with the colonic, I’m able to further assist the detoxification and healing process.  

  Sunny and I have merged our healing practices and our lives and have now met our greatest teacher thus far, our 2 year old daughter, Iolani Luz.  She has given us an added boost of direction and urgency to follow our vision because, of course, that is what we want for her.  We’re committed to using all that we have learned to help her grow up healthy and happy and we’re passionate about sharing the same with all that are interested.  

We don't claim to have it all figured out but we have experienced the potency of the modalities we have learned and we’ve seen the impact on our clients’ lives.  


Why this campaign is so important to us

We’ve dreamt of having an integrated clinic in some form for several years. The grand vision is to have a full clinic with a team of people from various healing modalities, all collaborating together with clients to put together the best possible healing path for them.  What we are asking for is help with the first step of this – to put the gifts that RoseHeal already has into full use and we are sure that the grand vision will grow into existence in time.  We have recently moved from Albuquerque to Santa Fe and feel this community is fertile ground for our clinic.  

To start, it will be a two room office offering Colonics, with the best water available in NM, Core Synchronism, Polarity, Massage, Flower Essences, Ayurvedic Consultations, and Womens Health with the possibility to teach private or small group classes in yoga, meditation, Ayurveda, and prenatal and birthing classes.

We want to practice colon hydrotherapy with the best water possible, as if it were coming straight out of a pristine mountain stream.  Unfortunately this is not so easy to come by in the desert or most places on earth but it is possible.  There are great water filters that can remove or neutralize harmful chemicals and impurities and there are relatively inexpensive ways to restructure the water back to its original state.  It has been proven that water holds memory of everything that goes on around it positive and negative, restructuring brings it back to neutral making it more absorbable, alkalizing and hydrating so the body can use it to cleanse toxins and repair tissue.  We feel passionate about offering these healing techniques and educating and assisting people on their healing journey just as our teachers and mentors have done with us.  


How you can help

  By helping to realize our vision, you are helping to create a place for real healing and transformation to take place.  A place where people can come to relax, be themselves, begin to let go of the accumulated toxins they have picked up in the course of  life’s challenges and to learn how to use food and lifestyle practices as medicine. As the individual heals the community heals…once the community is healthy it can help other communities.


So what if we don’t quite reach our goal?

  In the event that we don’t meet our goal, what’s been raised will be used for the most essential items, and unfortunately, a higher fee is charged by Indiegogo (more than double in fact). If we win the lottery we will still be doing this! This is really what we want to be doing (okay we might take a yearly vacation too).  Basically, this project is moving forward and we are along for the ride. We are a young family still putting down roots and we’re not really traditional bank loan material, at least at any sort of decent percentage. So anything that goes unfunded here, will probably end up on a credit card for a time - and it’ll be ok, but certainly it’s not the easiest way to begin something.  We also like the idea of engaging the community, and those close to us in funding this project - we’d certainly rather give you treatments than pay interest to an institution!


The Impact

  We feel strongly that this clinic will have a positive impact on the community.  Not only locally, but as our idea of health care and truly integrating both time tested wisdom with the latest innovations in technology to support the healing path spreads, our clinic model could provide a template for other communities to work from and expand on!


So do we have any experience with this sort of thing?

  Actually, we do. We’ve supported many people in improving their quality of life – from easing side effects of cancer treatment to supporting the release acute and chronic pain, to supporting health with cleanses, food, medicines and supplements.  

We’ll be drawing upon our own skills from past work (Sunny has owned and managed several businesses and worked in marketing and design), and accepting help from friends like John Martinez who’ll be doing the plumbing and Michael Ouellette who’s helping us decorate and furnish the space.


Want to know how it’s going?

  We’ll be documenting this process and will keep you posted as to how it turns out!


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone will be able to offer financial support, we get it!  You can still help, we are firm believers in prayer, intention and holding good thoughts for what you want to manifest in the world.  So if you are inclined, add this campaign to your prayer list.  You can also help us spread the word by posting this to any social media site you may be active in, send it to any email lists you may have, talk to your friends and family or people that you know that may have the means to help in this way. There are easy share tools that have been provided for you to make it as easy as possible, please use them! The more the word gets out the better the chance that this vision becomes a reality! Thank you for being part of this!

in.  We will need a computer or iPad and a printer to help with tracking
 transactions, processing payments, scheduling, etc.  In addition to the

in-house store that will have the best products available to support 
clients on their healing process and to help with maintaining the space
